original: 1. Suttantabhājanīyavaṇṇanā

original: Bhijjatīti sītādisannipāte visadisasantānuppattidassanato purimasantānassa bhedaṃ

original: sandhāyāha. Bhedo ca visadisatāvikārāpattīti bhijjatīti vikāraṃ āpajjatīti attho.
analyzed: sandhāya āha bhedaḥ ca visadisa tā vikāra āpatti iti bhijjati iti vikāram āpajjati iti attho

original: Vikārāpatti ca sītādisannipāte visadisarūpuppattiyeva. Arūpakkhandhānaṃ pana atilahuparivattito
analyzed: vikāra āpatti ca sītā ādi sannipāte visadisa rūpa uppattiyā iva arūpa kkhandhānam pana ati lahu parivattito

original: yathā rūpadhammānaṃ ṭhitikkhaṇe sītādīhi samāgamo hoti, yena tattha utuno ṭhitippattassa

original: purimasadisasantānuppādanasamatthatā na hoti āhārādikassa vā, evaṃ aññehi samāgamo
analyzed: purima sadisa santāna uppādana samattha tā na hoti āhāra ādikassa vā evam aññehi samāgamaḥ

original: natthi. Saṅghaṭṭanena ca vikārāpattiyaṃ ruppana-saddo niruḷho, tasmā arūpadhammānaṃ
analyzed: natthi saṅghaṭṭanena ca vikāra āpattiyam ruppana saddo niruḷho tasmai arūpa dhammānam

original: saṅghaṭṭanavirahitattā rūpadhammānaṃ viya pākaṭassa vikārassa abhāvato ca “ruppantī”ti
analyzed: saṅghaṭṭana virahita ttā rūpa dhammānam viya pākaṭassa vikārassa abhāvato ca ruppanti iti

original: “ruppanalakkhaṇā”ti ca na vuccanti. Jighacchāpipāsāhi ruppanañca udaraggisannipātena

original: hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ettha ca kuppatīti etena kattuatthe rūpapadasiddhiṃ dasseti, ghaṭṭīyati

original: pīḷīyatīti etehi kammatthe. Kopādikiriyāyeva hi ruppanakiriyāti. So pana kattubhūto
analyzed: pīḷīyati iti etehi kammatthe kopa ādi kiriyāya iva hi ruppana kiriyā ati saḥ pana kattu bhūtaḥ

original: kammabhūto ca attho bhijjamāno hotīti imassatthassa dassanatthaṃ “bhijjatīti attho”ti
analyzed: kamma bhūto ca atthaḥ bhijjamānaḥ hoti iti imassa atthassa dassana attham bhijjati iti attho ti

original: vuttaṃ. Atha vā ruppatīti rūpanti kammakattutthe rūpapadasiddhi vuttā. Vikāro hi
analyzed: vuttam atha vā ruppati iti kamma kattutthe vuttā vikāraḥ hi

original: ruppananti. Teneva “bhijjatīti attho”ti kammakattutthena bhijjati-saddena atthaṃ
analyzed: ruppananti tena iva bhijjati iti attho ti kamma kattutthena bhijjati saddena attham

original: dasseti. Yaṃ pana ruppati bhijjati, taṃ yasmā kuppati ghaṭṭīyati pīḷīyati, tasmā
analyzed: dasseti yam pana ruppati bhijjati tam yasmai kuppati ghaṭṭīyati pīḷīyati tasmai

analyzed: vuttam na kevalam sadda atthaḥ yeva ruppanam tassa pana atthassa lakkhaṇam ca hoti iti attha lakkhaṇa vasena

original: Chijjitvāti mucchāpattiyā muccitvā aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ chedanavasena vā chijjitvā. Accantakhārena

analyzed: santati sīsa hāni veditabbā

183. Cakkhussāti visesakāraṇaṃ asādhāraṇasāmibhāvena niddiṭṭhaṃ. Tañhi puggalantarāsādhāraṇaṃ

original: viya uppādetīti attho. Vidahatīti ca dhātuattho eva visiṭṭho upasaggena dīpitoti

original: etassāti chadhātuyo, yo loke “puriso”ti dhammasamudāyo vuccati, so chadhāturo channaṃ

original: Cakkhādīnaṃ kamo pubbe vuttoti idha ekekasmiṃ tike tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dhātūnaṃ kamaṃ dassento

analyzed: atulya yoge dvanda samāsa abhāvataḥ ayam pana ittha pāṭhaḥ siyā cakkhupe kāya viññāṇa manaḥ manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu bhedena ati

original: 1. Suttantabhājanīyaṃ
analyzed: suttanta bhājanīyam

original: Uddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: uddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 189. Sāsanakkamoti ariyasaccāni vuccanti ariyasaccadesanā vā. Sakalañhi sāsanaṃ bhagavato
analyzed: sāsana kkamaḥ ti ariya saccāni vuccanti ariya sacca desanā vā sakalam hi sāsanam bhagavato

original: vacanaṃ saccavinimuttaṃ natthīti saccesu kamati, sīlasamādhipaññāsaṅkhātaṃ vā sāsanaṃ
analyzed: vacanam sacca vinimuttam na atthi iti saccesu kamati sīla samādhi paññā saṅkhātam vā sāsanam

original: etesu kamati, tasmā kamati etthāti kamo, kiṃ kamati? Sāsanaṃ, sāsanassa kamo sāsanakkamoti
analyzed: etesu kamati tasmā kamati ettha ati kamaḥ kim kamati sāsanam sāsanassa kamaḥ sāsana kkamaḥ iti

original: saccāni sāsanapavattiṭṭhānāni vuccanti, taṃdesanā ca tabbohārenāti.
analyzed: saccāni sāsana pavatti ṭṭhānāni vuccanti tad desanā ca tad bohārena ati

original: Tathāti taṃsabhāvāva. Avitathāti amusāsabhāvā. Anaññathāti aññākārarahitā. Dukkhadukkhatātaṃnimittatāhi
analyzed: tathā ati avitathā ati anaññathā ati añña ākāra rahitā dukkha dukkha tā taṃnimitta tāhi

original: aniṭṭhatā pīḷanaṭṭho, dvidhāpi paridahanaṃ, kilesadāhasamāyogo vā santāpaṭṭhoti ayametesaṃ
analyzed: aniṭṭha tā pīḷana ṭṭhaḥ dvidhā api paridahanam kilesa dāha samāyogaḥ vā santāpa ṭṭhaḥ ti ayam etesam

original: viseso. Puggalahiṃsanaṃ vā pīḷanaṃ, attano eva tikhiṇabhāvo santāpanaṃ santāpoti.
analyzed: viseso puggala hiṃsanam vā pīḷanam attanaḥ eva tikhiṇa bhāvaḥ santāpanam

original: Ettha ca pīḷanaṭṭho dukkhassa saraseneva āvibhavanākāro, itare yathākkamaṃ samudayamagganirodhadassanehi
analyzed: ettha ca pīḷana ṭṭhaḥ dukkhassa sarasena iva āvi bhavana ākāraḥ itare yathākkamam samudaya magga nirodha dassanehi

original: āvibhavanākārāti ayaṃ catunnampi viseso. Tatratatrābhinandanavasena byāpetvā ūhanaṃ
analyzed: ayam tatra tatra abhinandana vasena ūhanam

original: rāsikaraṇaṃ dukkhanibbattanaṃ āyūhanaṃ, samudayato āgacchatīti vā āyaṃ, dukkhaṃ.
analyzed: rāsi karaṇam dukkha nibbattanam āyūhanam samudayataḥ āgacchati iti vai āyam dukkham

original: Tassa ūhanaṃ pavattanaṃ āyūhanaṃ, sarasāvibhāvanākāro eso. Nidadāti dukkhanti nidānaṃ,
analyzed: tassa ūhanam pavattanam āyūhanam sarasā vibhāvanā ākāraḥ esaḥ nidadāti dukkhanti nidānam

original: “idaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti sampaṭicchāpentaṃ viya samuṭṭhāpetīti attho. Dukkhadassanena
analyzed: idam tam dukkhan ti sampaṭicchāpentam viya samuṭṭhāpeti iti atthaḥ dukkha dassanena

original: cāyaṃ nidānaṭṭho āvi bhavati. Saṃyogapalibodhaṭṭhā nirodhamaggadassanehi, te ca saṃsārasaṃyojanamagganivāraṇākārā daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: ca ayam nidāna ṭṭhaḥ āvi bhavati saṃyoga palibodha ṭṭhā nirodha magga dassanehi te ca saṃsāra saṃyojana magga nivāraṇa ākārāḥ daṭṭhabbā

original: Nissaranti ettha sattā, sayameva vā nissaṭaṃ visaṃyuttaṃ sabbasaṅkhatehi sabbupadhipaṭinissaggabhāvatoti
analyzed: nissaranti ettha sattā sayam eva vā nissaṭam visaṃyuttam sabba saṅkhatehi sabba upadhi paṭinissagga bhāvato ti

original: nissaraṇaṃ. Ayamassa sabhāvena āvibhavanākāro. Vivekāsaṅkhatāmataṭṭhā samudayamaggadukkhadassanāvibhavanākārā,
analyzed: nissaraṇam ayam assa sabhāvena āvibhavana ākāraḥ viveka asaṅkha tā mata ṭṭhā samudaya magga dukkha dassana āvibhavana ākārā

original: samudayakkhayaappaccayaavināsitā vā. Saṃsārato niggamanaṃ niyyānaṃ. Ayamassa sarasena
analyzed: samudaya kkhaya appaccaya avināsi tā vā saṃsārataḥ niggamanam niyyānam ayam assa sa rasena

original: pakāsanākāro, itare samudayanirodhadukkhadassanehi. Tattha palibodhupacchedavasena
analyzed: pakāsana ākāraḥ itare samudaya nirodha dukkha dassanehi tattha palibodha upaccheda vasena

original: nibbānādhigamova nibbānanimittatā hetvaṭṭho. Paññāpadhānattā maggassa nibbānadassanaṃ,
analyzed: nibbāna adhigamaḥ uva nibbāna nimitta tā hetu aṭṭhaḥ paññā apadhāna ttā maggassa nibbāna dassanam

original: catusaccadassanaṃ vā dassanaṭṭho. Catusaccadassane kilesadukkhasantāpavūpasamane
analyzed: catu acca dassanam vā catu acca dassane kilesa dukkha santāpa vūpasamane

original: ca ādhipaccaṃ karonti maggaṅgadhammā sampayuttadhammesūti so maggassa adhipateyyaṭṭhoti.
analyzed: ca ādhipaccam karonti maggaṅga dhammā sampayutta dhammesu iti saḥ maggassa adhipateyya ṭṭho ti

original: Visesato vā ārammaṇādhipatibhūtā maggaṅgadhammā honti “maggādhipatino dhammā”ti vacanatoti
analyzed: visesataḥ vā ārammaṇa adhipati bhūtāḥ maggaṅga dhammāḥ honti magga adhipatino dhammā ati vacanato ti

original: so tesaṃ ākāro adhipateyyaṭṭho. Evamādi āhāti sambandho. Tattha abhisamayaṭṭhoti
analyzed: saḥ tesam ākāraḥ adhipateyya ṭṭho evamādi āha ati sambandhaḥ tattha abhisamaya ṭṭho ti

original: abhisametabbaṭṭho, abhisamayassa vā visayabhūto attho abhisamayaṭṭho, abhisamayasseva
analyzed: abhisametabba ṭṭhaḥ abhisamayassa vā visaya bhūtaḥ atthaḥ abhisamayaṭṭhaḥ abhisamayassa iva

original: vā pavattiākāro abhisamayaṭṭho, so cettha abhisametabbena pīḷanādinā dassitoti daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: vā pavatti ākāraḥ abhisamaya ṭṭho so ca ittha abhisametabbena pīḷana ādinā dassito ti daṭṭhabbaḥ

original: Kucchitaṃ khaṃ dukkhaṃ. “Samāgamo sameta”ntiādīsu kevalassa āgama-saddassa eta-saddassa
analyzed: kucchitam kham dukkham samāgamaḥ sameta nti ādīsu kevalassa āgama saddassa eta saddassa

original: ca payoge saṃyogatthassa anupalabbhanato saṃ-saddassa ca payoge upalabbhanato “saṃyogaṃ
analyzed: ca payoge saṃyoga atthassa anupalabbhanato saṃsaddassa ca payoge upalabbhanato saṃyogaṃ

original: dīpetī”ti āha, evaṃ “uppannaṃ udita”nti etthāpi. Aya-saddo gatiatthasiddho hetu-saddo
analyzed: dīpeti iti āha evam uppannam uditam ti ettha api aya saddaḥ gati attha siddhaḥ hetu saddaḥ

original: viya kāraṇaṃ dīpeti attano phalanipphādanena ayati pavattati, eti vā etasmā phalanti
analyzed: viya kāraṇam dīpeti attanaḥ phala nipphādanena ayati pavattati eti vā etasmai phalanti

original: ayoti, saṃyoge uppattikāraṇaṃ samudayoti ettha visuṃ payujjamānāpi upasagga-saddā
analyzed: saṃyoge uppatti kāraṇam ettha visum payujjamānā api upasagga saddā

original: sadhātukaṃ saṃyogatthaṃ uppādatthañca dīpenti kiriyāvisesakattāti veditabbā.
analyzed: sa dhātukam saṃyoga ttham uppāda ttham ca dīpenti kiriyā visesaka ttā iti veditabbā

original: Abhāvo ettha rodhassāti nirodhoti etena nibbānassa dukkhavivekabhāvaṃ dasseti. Samadhigate
analyzed: abhāvaḥ ettha rodhassa ati nirodhaḥ iti etena nibbānassa dukkha viveka bhāvam dasseti samadhigate

original: tasmiṃ tadadhigamavato puggalassa rodhābhāvo pavattisaṅkhātassa rodhassa paṭipakkhabhūtāya
analyzed: tasmim tad adhigamavataḥ puggalassa rodha abhāvo pavatti saṅkhātassa rodhassa paṭipakkha bhūtāya

original: nivattiyā adhigatattāti etasmiñcatthe abhāvo etasmiṃ rodhassāti nirodhoicceva padasamāso.
analyzed: nivattiyāḥ adhigata ttā ati etasmin ca atthe abhāvaḥ etasmin rodhassa ati nirodho iccā iva pada samāsaḥ

original: Dukkhābhāvo panettha puggalassa, na nibbānasseva. Anuppādo eva nirodho anuppādanirodho.
analyzed: dukkha abhāvo pana ittha puggalassa na nibbānassa iva anuppādaḥ eva nirodhaḥ anuppāda nirodho

original: Āyatibhavādīsu appavatti, na pana bhaṅgoti bhaṅgavācakaṃ nirodha-saddaṃ nivattetvā
analyzed: āyati bhava ādīsu appavatti na pana bhaṅgo ti bhaṅga vācakam nirodha saddam nivattetvā

original: anuppādavācakaṃ gaṇhāti. Etasmiṃ atthe kāraṇe phalopacāraṃ katvā nirodhapaccayo nirodhoti
analyzed: anuppāda vācakam gaṇhāti etasmin atthe kāraṇe phala upacāram katvā nirodha paccayaḥ nirodho ti

original: vutto. Paṭipadā ca hoti puggalassa dukkhanirodhappattiyā. Nanu sā eva dukkhanirodhappattīti
analyzed: vuttaḥ paṭipadā ca hoti puggalassa dukkha nirodha ppattiyā nanu sā eva dukkha nirodha ppattī iti

original: tassā eva sā paṭipadāti na yujjatīti? Na, puggalādhigamassa yehi so adhigacchati,
analyzed: tassāḥ eva sā paṭipadā ati na yujjati iti na puggala adhigamassa yehi so adhigacchati

original: tesaṃ kāraṇabhūtadhammānañca pattibhāvena paṭipadābhāvena ca vuttattā. Sacchikiriyāsacchikaraṇadhammānaṃ
analyzed: tesam kāraṇa bhūta dhammānam ca patti bhāvena paṭipadā abhāvena ca vutta ttā sacchikiriyā asacchikaraṇa dhammānam

original: aññattābhāvepi hi puggalasacchikiriyadhammabhāvehi nānattaṃ katvā niddeso kato. Atha
analyzed: aññatta abhāve pi hi puggala sacchikiriya dhamma bhāvehi nānattam katvā niddeso kataḥ atha

original: vā dukkhanirodhappattiyā niṭṭhānaṃ phalanti tassā dukkhanirodhappattiyā paṭipadatā daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: vā dukkha nirodha ppattiyāḥ niṭṭhānam phalanti tassāḥ dukkha nirodha ppattiyāḥ paṭipada tā daṭṭhabbā

original: Buddhādayo ariyā paṭivijjhantīti ettha paṭividdhakāle pavattaṃ buddhādivohāraṃ “agamā
analyzed: buddha ādayaḥ ariyā paṭivijjhanti iti ettha paṭividdha kāle pavattam buddha ādi vohāram agamā

original: rājagahaṃ buddho”tiādīsu viya purimakālepi āropetvā “buddhādayo”ti vuttaṃ. Te hi
analyzed: rāja gaham buddhaḥ ti ādīsu viya purima kāle api āropetvā buddha ādayaḥ iti vuttam te hi

original: buddhādayo catūhi maggehi paṭivijjhantīti. Ariyapaṭivijjhitabbāni saccāni ariyasaccānīti
analyzed: buddha ādayaḥ catūhi maggehi paṭivijjhanti iti ariya paṭivijjhitabbāni saccāni ariya saccāni iti

original: cettha purimapade uttarapadalopo daṭṭhabbo. Ariyā imanti paṭivijjhitabbaṭṭhena ekattaṃ
analyzed: ca ittha purima pade uttara pada lopaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ ariyāḥ iman ti paṭivijjhitabba ṭṭhena ekattam

original: upanetvā “ima”nti vuttaṃ. Tasmāti tathāgatassa ariyattā tassa saccānīti ariyasaccānīti
analyzed: upanetvā iman ti vuttam tasmā āti tathāgatassa ariya ttā tassa saccāni iti ariya saccāni iti

original: vuccantīti attho. Tathāgatena hi sayaṃ adhigatattā, teneva pakāsitattā, tato eva
analyzed: vuccanti iti attho tathāgatena hi sayam adhigata ttā tena iva pakāsita ttā tatas eva

original: ca aññehi adhigamanīyattā tāni tassa hontīti. Ariyabhāvasiddhitopīti ettha ariyasādhakāni
analyzed: ca aññehi adhigamanīya ttā tāni tassa honti iti ariya bhāva siddhitaḥ api iti ettha ariya sādhakāni

original: avitatharūpo daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: avitatha rūpaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Bādhanalakkhaṇanti ettha dukkhadukkhatannimittabhāvo bādhanā, udayabbayapīḷitatā
analyzed: bādhana lakkhaṇam ti ettha dukkha dukkha tad nimitta bhāvaḥ bādhanā udaya bbaya pīḍita tā

original: vā. Bhavādīsu jātiādivasena cakkhurogādivasena ca anekadhā dukkhassa pavattanameva
analyzed: vā bhava ādīsu jāti ādi vasena cakkhu roga ādi vasena ca anekadhā dukkhassa pavattanam eva

original: puggalassa santāpanaṃ, tadassa kiccaṃ raso. Pavattinivattīsu saṃsāramokkhesu pavatti
analyzed: puggalassa santāpanam tat assa kiccam rasaḥ pavatti nivattīsu saṃsāra mokkhesu pavatti

analyzed: purima bhavena pacchima bhavaḥ ghaṭito saṃyuttaḥ hutvā pavattati iti pabhavaḥ evam pi taṇhā anusaye

original: anūhate nibbattatī dukkhamidaṃ punappuna”nti evaṃ punappunaṃ uppādanaṃ anupacchedakaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: anūhate nibbattatī dukkham idam punappunanti evam punappunam uppādanam an upaccheda karaṇam

original: Bhavanissaraṇanivāraṇaṃ palibodho. Rāgakkhayādibhāvena sabbadukkhasantatā santi.
analyzed: bhava nissaraṇa nivāraṇam palibodhaḥ rāga kkhaya ādi bhāvena sabba dukkha santatā santi

original: Accutirasanti accutisampattikaṃ. Cavanaṃ vā kiccanti tadabhāvaṃ kiccamiva voharitvā
analyzed: accuti rasanti accuti sampattikam cavanam vā tad abhāvam kiccam iva voharitvā

original: accutikiccanti attho. Acavanañca sabhāvassāpariccajanaṃ avikāratā daṭṭhabbā. Pañcakkhandhanimittasuññatāya

original: aviggahaṃ hutvā gayhatīti animittapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Anusayupacchedanavasena saṃsāracārakato

analyzed: niggamana upāya bhāvaḥ niyyānam nimittataḥ pavattataḥ ca cittassa vuṭṭhānam hutvā gayhati iti

original: vuṭṭhānapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: vuṭṭhāna paccupaṭṭhānam

original: Asuvaṇṇādi suvaṇṇādi viya dissamānaṃ māyāti vatthusabbhāvā tassā viparītatā vuttā.
analyzed: a suvaṇṇa ādi suvaṇṇa ādi viya dissamānam māyā ati vatthu sabbhāvā tassāḥ viparīta tā vuttā

original: Udakaṃ viya dissamānā pana marīci upagatānaṃ tucchā hoti, vatthumattampi tassā na
analyzed: udakam viya dissamānā pana marīci upagatānam tucchā hoti vatthumattam pi tassā na

analyzed: dissati iti visaṃvādikā vuttā marīci māyā attānam vipakkhaḥ bhāvaḥ tacchā viparīta bhūta bhāvaḥ

original: Ariyañāṇassāti avitathagāhakassa ñāṇassa, tena paṭivedhapaccavekkhaṇāni gayhanti,

original: Tañhi katthaci kaṭṭhādiupādānabhedepi visaṃvādakaṃ viparītaṃ abhūtaṃ vā kadāci na
analyzed: tat hi katthaci kaṭṭha ādi upādāna bhede pi visaṃvādakam viparītam abhūtam vā kadāci na

original: hoti. “Byādhidhammā jarādhammā, atho maraṇadhammino”ti ettha vuttā jātiādikā lokapakati.

original: Manussānaṃ uddhaṃ dīghatā, ekaccānaṃ tiracchānānaṃ tiriyaṃ dīghatā, vuddhiniṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: manussānam uddham dīghatā ekaccānam tiracchānānam tiriyam dīghatā vuddhi niṭṭham

original: pattānaṃ puna avaḍḍhanaṃ evamādikā cāti vadanti. Tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvesu pacchimo

original: tathatā, paṭhamo avitathatā, majjhimo anaññathatāti ayametesaṃ viseso.
analyzed: tathatā paṭhamaḥ avitathatā majjhimaḥ anaññathatā ati ayam etesam visesaḥ

original: Dukkhā aññaṃ na bādhakanti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu taṇhāpi jāti viya dukkhanimittatāya
analyzed: dukkhā aññam na bādhakan ti kasmā vuttam nanu taṇhā api jāti viya dukkha nimitta tāya

original: bādhikāti? Na, bādhakapabhavabhāvena visuṃ gahitattā. Jātiādīnaṃ viya vā dukkhassa

original: adhiṭṭhānabhāvo dukkhadukkhatā ca bādhakatā, na dukkhassa pabhavakatāti natthi taṇhāya

original: pabhavakabhāvena gahitāya bādhakattappasaṅgo. Tenāha “dukkhā aññaṃ na bādhaka”nti.
analyzed: pabhavaka bhāvena gahitāya bādhaka tta pasaṅgo tena āha dukkhāḥ aññam na bādhakanti

original: Bādhakattaniyāmenāti dukkhaṃ bādhakameva, dukkhameva bādhakanti evaṃ dvidhāpi bādhakattāvadhāraṇenāti
analyzed: bādhaka tta niyāmena ati dukkham bādhakam eva dukkham eva bādhakanti evam dvidhā api bādhaka ttā avadhāraṇena ati

original: attho. Taṃ vinā nāññatoti satipi avasesakilesaavasesākusalasāsavakusalamūlāvasesasāsavakusaladhammānaṃ
analyzed: atthaḥ tam vinā na aññato ti sati pi avasesa kilesa avasesa akusala sāsava kusala mūla avasesa sāsava kusala dhammānam

original: dukkhahetubhāve na taṇhāya vinā tesaṃ dukkhahetubhāvo atthi, tehi pana vināpi taṇhāya

analyzed: hoti tadā ettha uppajjati iti sāmaññena gahitā uppāda kiriyā lakkhaṇa bhāvena vuttā

original: 3. Nirodhasaccaniddesavaṇṇanā

original: Nirodhasaccaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

analyzed: tasmāt ettha abhisaṅkharaṇaka saṅkhāram saṅkhāra saddena āgatam sandhāya

original: tattha vuttampi vajjetvā saṅkhārasaddena āgatasaṅkhārā yojetabbā. “Saṅkhāra-saddenāgatasaṅkhārā”ti
analyzed: tattha vuttam pi vajjetvā saṅkhāra saddena āgata saṅkhārā yojetabbā saṅkhāra saddena āgata saṅkhārā ati

original: vā samudāyo vutto, tadekadeso ca idha vaṇṇitabbabhāvena “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti,
analyzed: vā samudāyaḥ vuttaḥ tad eka deso ca idha vaṇṇitabba bhāvena avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā ti

original: tasmā vaṇṇitabbasabbasaṅgahaṇavasena duvidhatā vuttāti veditabbā. Paṭhamaṃ nirujjhati
analyzed: tasmā vaṇṇitabba sabba saṅgahaṇa vasena duvidha tā vuttā iti veditabbā paṭhamam nirujjhati

original: vacīsaṅkhārotiādinā vitakkavicāraassāsapassāsasaññāvedanāvacīsaṅkhārādayo vuttā,
analyzed: vacī saṅkhāraḥ ti ādinā vitakka vicāra assāsa passāsa saññā vedanā vacī saṅkhāra ādayaḥ vuttā

original: na avijjāsaṅkhāresu vuttā kāyasañcetanādayo.
analyzed: na avijjā saṅkhāresu vuttā kāya sañcetanā ādayaḥ

original: Paritassatīti pipāsati. Bhavatīti upapattibhavaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, bhāvayatīti kammabhavaṃ.
analyzed: paritassati iti pipāsati bhavati iti upapatti bhavam sandhāya vuttam bhāvayati iti kamma bhavam

original: Cuti khandhānaṃ maraṇanti “maranti etenā”ti vuttaṃ. “Dukkhā vedanā uppādadukkhā ṭhitidukkhā”ti
analyzed: cuti khandhānam maraṇanti maranti etena ati vuttam dukkhā vedanā uppāda dukkhā ṭhiti dukkhā

original: vacanato dvedhā khaṇati. Āyāsoti parissamo visādo. Kevala-saddo asammissavācako hoti
analyzed: vacanataḥ dvedhā āyāsaḥ ti parissamaḥ visādaḥ kevala saddo a sammissa vācakaḥ hoti

original: “kevalā sālayo”ti, niravasesavācako ca “kevalā aṅgamagadhā”ti, tasmā dvedhāpi atthaṃ
analyzed: kevalā ca kevalā tasmā dvedhā api attham

original: vadati. Tattha asammissassāti sukharahitassa. Na hi ettha kiñci uppādavayarahitaṃ atthīti.
analyzed: vadati tattha asammissassa ati sukha rahitassa na hi ettha kiñci uppāda vaya rahitam atthi iti

original: Taṃsampayutte, puggalaṃ vā sammohayatīti sammohanarasā. Ārammaṇasabhāvassa chādanaṃ
analyzed: tad sampayutte puggalam vā sammohayati iti sammohana rasāḥ ārammaṇa sabhāvassa chādanam

analyzed: hutvā gayhati iti chādana paccupaṭṭhānā āsava samudayā avijjā samudayo ti vacanataḥ āsava padaṭṭhānā

original: Paṭisandhijananatthaṃ āyūhanti byāpāraṃ karontīti āyūhanarasā, rāsikaraṇaṃ vā āyūhanaṃ.
analyzed: paṭisandhi janana attham āyūhanti byāpāram karonti iti āyūhana rasāḥ rāsi karaṇam vā āyūhanam

original: Nāmarūpassa purecārikabhāvena pavattatīti pubbaṅgamarasaṃ. Purimabhavena saddhiṃ
analyzed: nāma rūpassa purecārika bhāvena pavattati iti pubbaṅgama rasam purima bhavena saddhim

original: ghaṭanaṃ hutvā gayhatīti paṭisandhipaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Viññāṇena saha sampayujjatīti

original: sampayogarasaṃ. Aññamaññaṃ sampayogābhāvato rūpaṃ vikiratīti vikiraṇarasaṃ. Evañca
analyzed: sampayoga rasam aññam aññam sampayoga abhāvataḥ rūpam vikirati iti vikiraṇa rasam evam ca

original: katvā pisiyamānā taṇḍulādayo vikiranti cuṇṇī bhavantīti. Nāmassa kadāci kusalādibhāvo
analyzed: katvā pisiyamānā taṇḍula ādayaḥ vikiranti cuṇṇī bhavanti iti nāmassa kadāci kusala ādi bhāvaḥ

original: ca atthīti tato visesanatthaṃ “abyākatapaccupaṭṭhāna”nti āha. “Acetanā abyākatā”ti
analyzed: ca atthi iti tatas visesana attham abyākata paccupaṭṭhānan ti āha acetanā abyākatā ti

original: ettha viya anārammaṇatā vā abyākatatā daṭṭhabbā. Āyatanalakkhaṇanti ghaṭanalakkhaṇaṃ,
analyzed: ettha viya anārammaṇa tā vā abyākata tā daṭṭhabbā āyatana lakkhaṇam ti ghaṭana lakkhaṇam

original: āyānaṃ tananalakkhaṇaṃ vā. Dassanādīnaṃ kāraṇabhāvo dassanādirasatā. Akusalavipākupekkhāya
analyzed: āyānam tanana lakkhaṇam vā dassana ādīnam kāraṇa bhāvaḥ dassana ādi rasa tā akusala vipāka upekkhāya

original: aniṭṭhabhāvato dukkhena itarāya ca iṭṭhabhāvato sukhena saṅgahitattā “sukhadukkhapaccupaṭṭhānā”ti
analyzed: aniṭṭha bhāvataḥ dukkhena itarāya ca iṭṭha bhāvataḥ sukhena saṅgahita ttā sukha dukkha paccupaṭṭhānā ati

original: āha. Dukkhasamudayattā hetulakkhaṇā taṇhā. “Tatratatrābhinandinī”ti vacanato abhinandanarasā.
analyzed: āha dukkha samudaya ttā hetu lakkhaṇā taṇhā tatra tatra abhinandinī iti vacanataḥ abhinandana rasā

original: Cittassa, puggalassa vā rūpādīsu atittabhāvo hutvā gayhatīti atittabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: cittassa puggalassa vā rūpa ādīsu a titta bhāvaḥ hutvā gayhati iti a titta bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā

original: Taṇhādaḷhattaṃ hutvā kāmupādānaṃ, sesāni diṭṭhi hutvā upaṭṭhahantīti taṇhādaḷhattadiṭṭhipaccupaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: taṇhā daḷhattam hutvā kāma upādānam sesāni diṭṭhi hutvā upaṭṭhahanti iti taṇhā daḷhatta diṭṭhi paccupaṭṭhānā

original: Kammupapattibhavavasena bhavassa lakkhaṇādayo yojetabbā.
analyzed: kamma upapatti bhava vasena bhavassa lakkhaṇa ādayaḥ yojetabbā

original: Ādi-saddena anubodhādibhāvaggahaṇaṃ. Dukkhādīsu aññāṇaṃ appaṭipatti, asubhādīsu subhādivipallāsā
analyzed: ādi saddena anubodha ādi bhāva ggahaṇam dukkha ādīsu aññāṇam appaṭipatti asubha ādīsu subha ādi vipallāsā

original: micchāpaṭipatti. Diṭṭhivippayuttā vā appaṭipatti, diṭṭhisampayuttā micchāpaṭipatti.
analyzed: micchā paṭipatti diṭṭhi vippayuttā vā appaṭipatti diṭṭhi sampayuttā micchā paṭipatti

original: Na avijjāya eva chadvārikatā chaḷārammaṇatā ca, atha kho aññesupi paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu
analyzed: na avijjāya eva cha dvārika tā chaṭṭha ārammaṇa tā ca atha kho aññesu pi paṭiccasamuppāda aṅgesu

original: arūpadhammānanti āha “sabbesupī”ti. Nobhayagocaranti manāyatanamāha. Na hi arūpadhammānaṃ
analyzed: arūpa dhammānam ti āha sabbesu pi iti na ubhaya gocaram iti mana āyatanam āha na hi arūpa dhammānam

original: desavasena āsannatā dūratā ca atthi asaṇṭhānattā, tasmā manāyatanassa gocaro na manāyatanaṃ
analyzed: desa vasena āsanna tā dūra tā ca atthi asaṇṭhāna ttā tasmā mana āyatanassa gocaraḥ na mana āyatanam

original: sampatto asampatto vāti vuccatīti.
analyzed: sampattaḥ a sampattaḥ vā ati vuccati iti

original: Sokādīnaṃ sabbhāvā aṅgabahuttappasaṅge “dvādasevā”ti aṅgānaṃ vavatthānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: soka ādīnam sabbhāvāḥ aṅga bahutta ppasaṅge dvādasa iva āti aṅgānam vavatthānam veditabbam

original: Na hi sokādayo aṅgabhāvena vuttā, phalena pana kāraṇaṃ avijjaṃ mūlaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ
analyzed: na hi soka ādayaḥ aṅga bhāvena vuttā phalena pana kāraṇam avijjam mūlaṅgam dassetuṃ

analyzed: te vuttā ati jarā maraṇa bbhā hatassa hi bālassa te sambhavanti iti soka ādīnam jarā maraṇa kāraṇa tā

analyzed: vuttā sārīrikāya dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭhā ti ca sutte jarā maraṇa nimittam ca dukkham

analyzed: saṅgahitam iti sādhaka bhāvena vuttam yasmā pana jarā maraṇena iva soka ādīnam

original: ekasaṅkhepo kato, tasmā tesaṃ jātipaccayatā yujjati. Jarāmaraṇapaccayabhāve hi avijjāya
analyzed: eka saṅkhepo kato tasmā tesam jāti paccaya tā yujjati jarā maraṇa paccaya bhāve hi avijjāya

original: ekasaṅkhepo kātabbo siyā, jātipaccayā pana jarāmaraṇaṃ sokādayo ca sambhavantīti.
analyzed: eka saṅkhepaḥ kātabbo siyā jāti paccayā pana jarā maraṇam soka ādayo ca sambhavanti iti

original: Tattha jarāmaraṇaṃ ekantikaṃ aṅgabhāveneva gahitaṃ, sokādayo pana rūpabhavādīsu abhāvato
analyzed: tattha jarā maraṇam ekantikam aṅga bhāvena iva gahitam soka ādayaḥ pana rūpa bhava ādīsu abhāvataḥ

analyzed: anekantikā kevalam pākaṭena phalena avijjā nidassana attham gahitā tena anāgate jātiyā

analyzed: sati tato parāya paṭisandhiyā hetu hetu bhūtā avijjā dassitā ati bhava cakkassa avicchedaḥ

analyzed: na soka ādīnam bālassa jarā maraṇa nimitta tā mattassa assutavā puthujjanaḥ iti hi vacanena

original: Uddesavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: uddesa vāra vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

analyzed: avijjā pada niddesa vaṇṇanā

analyzed: avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā ti hi vuttanti etena avijjāya visesana bhāvena

analyzed: dīghaḥ sāmaḥ mittaḥ rassaḥ o dātaḥ dattaḥ iti

analyzed: saḥ eva lakkhitabba ttā lakkhaṇanti yāthāvasa rasa lakkhaṇam katamā ca bhikkhave

original: avijjā? Dukkhe aññāṇa”ntiādinā sutte cattāreva vuttānīti “suttantikapariyāyenā”ti
analyzed: avijjā dukkhe aññāṇa nti ādinā sutte cattāreva vuttāni iti suttantika pariyāyena ati

original: āha. Nikkhepakaṇḍe panātiādinā idha catūsu ṭhānesu kathitāya eva avijjāya nikkhepakaṇḍe
analyzed: āha nikkhepa kaṇḍe pana ati ādinā idha catūsu ṭhānesu kathitāya eva avijjāya nikkhepa kaṇḍe

analyzed: aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu kicca jātitaḥ pañcavīsatiyā padehi lakkhaṇato ca kathita ttā tad attha saṃvaṇṇanā vasena

analyzed: vibhāvanam karoti a hāpetvā vibhajitabba vibhajanam hi abhidhamma pariyāyaḥ

original: Jāyati etthāti jāti, uppattiṭṭhānaṃ. Yadipi nirodhamagge avijjā ārammaṇaṃ na karoti,

analyzed: te pana jānitu kāmassa tad paṭicchādana vasena anirodha maggesu nirodha magga ggahaṇaka āraṇa vasena

analyzed: ca pavattamānā tattha uppajjati iti vuccati iti tesam pi avijjāya uppatti ṭṭhāna tā hoti

analyzed: itaresam ārammaṇa bhāvena ca ati saṅghika bala deva goṇa ādīnam saṅghāṭi naṅgala ādīni

analyzed: añña seta ādīnam avijjāya dukkha ādi visayānam lobha ādīnam nivattakaḥ aññāṇa ādi sabhāvaḥ

original: lakkhaṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: lakkhaṇan ti daṭṭhabbam

original: Atthatthanti phalaphalaṃ. Āmeḍitavacanañhi sabbesaṃ atthānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ pākaṭakaraṇabhāvappakāsanatthaṃ.
analyzed: attha attham ti phala phalam āmeḍita vacanam hi sabbesam atthānam visum visum pākaṭa karaṇa bhāva ppakāsana tham

analyzed: attho eva vā atthaḥ attha ttho ti atthassa aviparīta tā dassana ttham atthena iva attham visesayati

original: Na hi ñāṇaṃ anatthaṃ atthoti gaṇhātīti. Evaṃ kāraṇakāraṇanti etthāpi daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: na hi ñāṇam anattham gaṇhāti iti evam kāraṇa kāraṇam ti ettha api daṭṭhabbam

original: Taṃ ākāranti atthatthādiākāraṃ. Gahetvāti citte pavesetvā, cittena puggalena vā gahitaṃ
analyzed: tam ākāram ti attha attha ādi ākāram gahetvā ti citte pavesetvā cittena puggalena vā gahitam

original: katvā. Paṭividdhassa puna avekkhaṇā paccavekkhaṇā. Duccintitacintitādilakkhaṇassa
analyzed: katvā paṭividdhassa puna avekkhaṇā paccavekkhaṇā duccintita cintita ādi lakkhaṇassa

original: bālassa bhāvo bālyaṃ. Pajānātīti pakārehi jānāti. Balavamohanaṃ pamoho. Samantato mohanaṃ sammoho.
analyzed: bālassa bhāvaḥ bālyam pajānāti iti pakārehi jānāti balava mohanam pamohaḥ samantataḥ mohanam sammohaḥ

original: Dukkhārammaṇatāti dukkhārammaṇatāya, yāya vā avijjāya chādentiyā dukkhārammaṇā taṃsampayuttadhammā,
analyzed: dukkha ārammaṇa tā ti dukkha ārammaṇa tāya yāya vā avijjāya chādentiyā dukkha ārammaṇā tad sampayutta dhammā

original: sā tesaṃ bhāvoti dukkhārammaṇatā, ārammaṇameva vā ārammaṇatā, dukkhaṃ ārammaṇatā
analyzed: sā tesam bhāvaḥ ti dukkha ārammaṇa tā ārammaṇam eva vā ārammaṇa tā dukkham ārammaṇa tā

original: etissāti dukkhārammaṇatā.
analyzed: etissa ati dukkha ārammaṇa tā

original: Duddasattā gambhīrā na sabhāvato, tasmā tadārammaṇatā avijjā uppajjati, itaresaṃ
analyzed: duddasa ttā gambhīrā na sabhāvataḥ tasmā tad ārammaṇa tā avijjā uppajjati itaresam

original: sabhāvato gambhīrattā tadārammaṇatā nuppajjatīti adhippāyo. Apica kho panāti maggassa
analyzed: sabhāvataḥ gambhīra ttā tad ārammaṇa tā nuppajjati iti adhippāyaḥ api ca kho pana ati maggassa

original: saṅkhatasabhāvattā tatopi nirodhassa gambhīratarataṃ dasseti.
analyzed: saṅkhata sabhāva ttā nirodhassa gambhīratara tam dasseti

original: Avijjāpadaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: avijjā pada niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Saṅkhārapadaniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: saṅkhāra pada niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: Punātīti sodheti apuññaphalato dukkhasaṃkilesato ca, hitasukhajjhāsayena puññaṃ karotīti
analyzed: punāti iti sodheti apuñña phalataḥ dukkha saṃkilesataḥ ca hita sukha jjhāsayena puññam karoti iti

original: taṃnipphādanena kārakassajjhāsayaṃ pūretīti puñño, pūrako pujjanibbattako ca niruttilakkhaṇena
analyzed: tad nipphādanena kārakassa ajjhāsayam pūreti iti puñño pūrako ca nirutti lakkhaṇena

original: “puñño”ti veditabbo. Samādhipaccanīkānaṃ atidūratāya na iñjati na calatīti attho.
analyzed: puññaḥ ti veditabbaḥ samādhi paccanīkānam ati dūra tāya na iñjati na calati iti attho

original: Kāyassāti dvārassa sāmibhāvena niddeso kato.
analyzed: kāyassa ati dvārassa sāmi bhāvena niddeso kato

original: Puññupaganti bhavasampattupagaṃ. Tatthāti vibhaṅgasutte. Tañhi padhānabhāvena gahitanti.
analyzed: puñña upaganti bhava sampatta upagam tattha ati vibhaṅga sutte tat hi padhāna bhāvena gahitanti

original: Sammādiṭṭhisutte pana “tayome, āvuso, saṅkhārā”ti āgatanti. Sabbaññujinabhāsito pana
analyzed: sammādiṭṭhi sutte pana tayo me āvuso saṅkhārāti āgatanti sabbaññu jina bhāsito pana

analyzed: na vuttāḥ na ca dassanena pahātabbāḥ bhāvanāya pahātabbānam kenaci paccayena paccayo ti

original: vuttā. Ye hi dassanena pahātabbapaccayā kilesā, na te dassanato uddhaṃ pavattanti,
analyzed: vuttāḥ ye hi dassanena pahātabba paccayāḥ kilesāḥ na te dassanataḥ uddham pavattanti

original: dassanena pahātabbapaccayassapi pana uddhaccasahagatassa sahāyavekallamattameva dassanena

original: kataṃ, na tassa koci bhāvo dassanena anuppattidhammataṃ āpāditoti tassa ekantabhāvanāya

original: pahātabbatā vuttā. Tasmā tassa tādisasseva sati sahāye vipākuppādanavacanaṃ, asati
analyzed: pahātabba tā vuttā tasmā tassa tādisassa iva sati sahāye vipāka uppādana vacanam asati

original: ca vipākānuppādanavacanaṃ na virujjhatīti.
analyzed: ca vipāka anuppādana vacanam na virujjhati iti

original: Sāpi viññāṇapaccayabhāve yadi apanetabbā, kasmā “samavīsati cetanā”ti vuttanti tassa

analyzed: saha ekavīsati iti vattabbanti na avacanassa vutta kāraṇa ttā tam pana itara avacanassa api

analyzed: vuttāya api avattabba tam dasseti āneñja abhisaṅkhāro citta saṅkhāro eva ati bheda abhāvā

original: pākaṭoti na tassa saṃyogo dassito.
analyzed: pākaṭaḥ ti na tassa saṃyogaḥ dassito

original: Sukhasaññāya gahetvāti etena taṇhāpavattiṃ dasseti. Taṇhāparikkhāreti taṇhāya parivāre,

analyzed: taṇhāya sukham subhanti ādinā vā alaṅkatā iti attho taṇhā hi dukkhassa samudayo ti

analyzed: viya maresu amara saddaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: tadabhimukhagamanasadisatā ca āneñjābhisaṅkhārassa yojetabbā.

analyzed: attano ca sa moha citta jānana kāle iti yojetabbā

original: pākaṭaṃ karonto “iti ayaṃ avijjā”tiādimāha.

original: attho daṭṭhabbo. Pañca pubbanimittānīti “mālā milāyanti, vatthāni kilissanti, kacchehi
analyzed: atthaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ pañca pubba nimittāni iti mālāḥ milāyanti vatthāni kilissanti kacchehi

original: sedā muccanti, kāye vevaṇṇiyaṃ okkamati, devo devāsane nābhiramatī”ti vuttāni pañca
analyzed: sedāḥ muccanti kāye vevaṇṇiyam okkamati devaḥ devāsane na abhiramati iti vuttāni pañca

original: maraṇapubbanimittānīti attho. Tāni hi disvā kammanibbattakkhandhasaṅkhāte upapattibhave
analyzed: maraṇa pubba nimittāni iti atthaḥ tāni hi disvā kamma nibbatta kkhandha saṅkhāte upapatti bhave

original: bhavachandabalena devānaṃ balavasoko uppajjatīti. Bāloti avidvā. Tena avijjāya kāraṇabhāvaṃ
analyzed: bhava chanda balena devānam balava sokaḥ uppajjati iti bālaḥ iti avidvā tena avijjāya kāraṇa bhāvam

original: dasseti. Tividhanti tassāruppakathāsavanakammakāraṇādassanamaraṇakālakammopaṭṭhānanidānaṃ
analyzed: dasseti tividhanti

original: sokādidukkhaṃ. Āsave sādhentīti āsave gamenti bodhentīti attho.
analyzed: soka ādi dukkham āsave sādhenti iti āsave gamenti bodhenti iti attho

original: Evaṃ satīti aviditāditāya anādibhāve sati. Ādimattakathanantiādi etassa atthīti ādimaṃ,
analyzed: evam sati iti avidita āditāya anādi bhāve sati etassa atthi iti ādimam

original: bhavacakkaṃ. Tassa bhāvo ādimattaṃ, tassa kathanaṃ ādimattakathanaṃ. Visesanivattiattho
analyzed: bhava cakkam tassa bhāvaḥ ādimattam tassa kathanam ādimatta kathanam visesa nivatti attho

original: vā matta-saddo, sati anādibhāve avijjā ādimhi majjhe pariyosāne ca sabbattha siyāti
analyzed: vā matta saddaḥ sati anādi bhāve avijjā ādimhi majjhe pariyosāne ca sabbattha siyāti

original: ādimattāya avijjāya kathanaṃ virujjhatīti attho. Avijjāggahaṇenāti avijjāya uppādanena
analyzed: ādimattāya avijjāya kathanam virujjhati iti atthaḥ avijjā ggahaṇena ati avijjāya uppādanena

original: kathanena, appahānena vā, attano santāne sannihitabhāvakaraṇenāti attho. Kammādīnīti
analyzed: kathanena appahānena vā attano santāne sannihita bhāva karaṇena ati attho kamma ādīni iti

original: kammavipākavaṭṭāni. Vaṭṭakāraṇabhāvena padhānattā “padhānadhammo”ti avijjā kathitā.
analyzed: kamma vipāka vaṭṭāni vaṭṭa kāraṇa bhāvena padhāna ttā padhāna dhammaḥ ti avijjā kathitā

original: Vadatīti vado. Vedeti, vediyatīti vā vedeyyo, sukhādiṃ anubhavati, sabbavisaye vā
analyzed: vadati iti vadaḥ vedeti vediyati iti vā vedeyyaḥ sukha ādim anubhavati sabba visaye vā

original: jānāti, “sukhito”tiādinā attanā parehi ca jānāti ñāyati cāti attho. Brahmādinā vā
analyzed: jānāti sukhita uti ādinā attanā parehi ca jānāti ñāyati ca ati atthaḥ brahma ādinā vā

original: attanā vāti vā-saddo ca-saddattho. Tenāha “kārakavedakarahita”nti ca-saddatthasamāsaṃ.
analyzed: attanā vā ati vāsaddaḥ tena āha kāraka vedaka rahitanti casaddattha samāsam

original: Dvādasavidhasuññatāsuññanti avijjādīnaṃ dvādasavidhānaṃ suññatāya suññaṃ, catubbidhampi
analyzed: dvādasavidha suñña tā suññanti avijja ādīnam dvādasavidhānam suñña tāya suññam catubbidham pi

original: vā suññataṃ ekaṃ katvā dvādasaṅgatāya dvādasavidhāti tāya dvādasavidhāya suññatāya suññanti attho.
analyzed: vā suññatam ekam katvā dvādasaṅgatāya tāya dvādasavidhāya suññatāya suññanti attho

original: Pubbantāharaṇatoti pubbantato paccuppannavipākassa āharaṇato paricchinnavedanāvasānaṃ
analyzed: pubbanta āharaṇato ti pubbantataḥ paccuppanna vipākassa āharaṇato paricchinna vedanā avasānam

original: etaṃ bhavacakkanti attho. Bhavacakkekadesopi hi bhavacakkanti vuccati. Vedanā vā

original: taṇhāsahāyāya avijjāya paccayo hotīti vedanāto avijjā, tato saṅkhārāti sambajjhanato
analyzed: taṇhā sahāyāya avijjāya paccayaḥ hoti iti vedanātaḥ avijjā tatas saṅkhārā ati sambajjhanato

original: vedanāvasānaṃ bhavacakkanti yuttametaṃ, evaṃ taṇhāmūlake ca yojetabbaṃ. Dvinnampi
analyzed: vedanā avasānam bhava cakkanti yuttam etam evam taṇhā mūlake ca yojetabbam dvinnam pi

original: hi aññamaññaṃ anuppaveso hotīti. Avijjā dhammasabhāvaṃ paṭicchādetvā viparītābhinivesaṃ
analyzed: hi aññam aññam anuppavesaḥ hoti iti avijjā dhamma sabhāvam paṭicchādetvā viparīta abhinivesam

original: karontī diṭṭhicarite saṃsāre nayati, tesaṃ vā saṃsāraṃ saṅkhārādipavattiṃ nayati
analyzed: karontī diṭṭhi carite saṃsāre nayati tesam vā saṃsāram saṅkhāra ādi pavattim nayati

original: pavattetīti “saṃsāranāyikā”ti vuttā. Phaluppattiyāti kattuniddeso. Viññāṇādipaccuppannaphaluppatti
analyzed: pavatteti iti saṃsāra nāyikā ati vuttā phala uppattiyā ti kattu niddesaḥ viññāṇa ādi paccuppanna phala uppatti

original: hi idha diṭṭhā, adiṭṭhānañca purimabhave attano hetūnaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārānaṃ phalaṃ
analyzed: hi idha diṭṭhāḥ adiṭṭhānam ca purima bhave attanaḥ hetūnam avijjā saṅkhārānam phalam

original: ajanetvā anupacchijjanaṃ pakāseti. Atha vā purimabhavacakkaṃ dutiyena sambandhaṃ
analyzed: a janetvā an upacchijjanam pakāseti atha vā purima bhava cakkam dutiyena sambandham

original: vuttanti vedanāsaṅkhātassa phalassa uppattiyā taṇhādīnaṃ hetūnaṃ anupacchedaṃ pakāseti,
analyzed: vuttam ti vedanā saṅkhātassa phalassa uppattiyā taṇhā ādīnam hetūnam anupacchedam pakāseti

original: tasmā phaluppattiyā kāraṇabhūtāya paṭhamassa bhavacakkassa hetūnaṃ anupacchedappakāsanatoti
analyzed: tasmā phala uppattiyā kāraṇa bhūtāya paṭhamassa bhava cakkassa hetūnam an upaccheda pakāsanato ti

original: attho. Saṅkhārādīnameva vā phalānaṃ uppattiyā avijjādīnaṃ hetūnaṃ phalaṃ ajanetvā
analyzed: saṅkhāra ādīnam eva vā phalānam uppattiyāḥ avijjā ādīnam hetūnam phalam a janetvā

original: anupacchedameva, viññāṇādihetūnaṃ vā saṅkhārādīnaṃ anubandhanameva pakāseti paṭhamaṃ
analyzed: an upacchedam eva viññāṇa ādi hetūnam vā saṅkhāra ādīnam anubandhanam eva pakāseti paṭhamam

original: bhavacakkaṃ, na dutiyaṃ viya pariyosānampīti “phaluppattiyā hetūnaṃ anupacchedappakāsanato”ti
analyzed: bhava cakkam na dutiyam viya pariyosānam pi iti phala uppattiyāḥ hetūnam an upaccheda pakāsanato ti

original: vuttaṃ. “Viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”nti ettha aparipuṇṇāyatanakalalarūpaṃ vatvā tato
analyzed: vuttam viññāṇa paccayā nāma rūpan ti ettha a paripuṇṇa āyatana kalala rūpam vatvā tatas

original: uddhaṃ “nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana”nti saḷāyatanappavatti vuttāti āha “anupubbapavattidīpanato”ti.
analyzed: uddham nāma rūpa paccayā saḷāyatanan ti saḷāyatana ppavatti vuttā iti āha anupubba pavatti dīpanato ti

original: “Bhavapaccayā jātī”ti ettha na āyatanānaṃ kamena uppatti vuttāti āha “sahuppattidīpanato”ti.
analyzed: bhava paccayā jāti iti ettha na āyatanānam kamena uppatti vuttā iti āha sahuppatti dīpanato ti

original: Hetuādipubbakā tayo sandhī etassāti hetuphalahetupubbakatisandhi, bhavacakkaṃ. Hetuphalahetuphalavasena
analyzed: hetu ādi pubbakā tayo sandhī etassa ati hetu phala hetu pubbaka tisandhi bhava cakkam hetu phala hetu phala vasena

original: catuppabhedo aṅgānaṃ saṅgaho etassāti catubhedasaṅgahaṃ. Sarūpato avuttāpi tasmiṃ
analyzed: catu pabhedaḥ aṅgānam saṅgahaḥ etassa ati catu bheda saṅgaham sarūpataḥ a vuttā api tasmin

original: tasmiṃ saṅgahe ākirīyanti avijjāsaṅkhārādiggahaṇehi pakāsīyantīti ākārā, atītahetuādīnaṃ

original: vā pakārā ākārā. Kilesakammavipākā vipākakilesakammehi sambandhā hutvā punappunaṃ
analyzed: vā pakārā ākārā kilesa kamma vipākā vipāka kilesa kammehi sambandhāḥ hutvā punappunam

original: parivattantīti tesu vaṭṭanāmaṃ āropetvā “tivaṭṭa”nti vuttaṃ, vaṭṭekadesattā vā “vaṭṭānī”ti vuttāni.
analyzed: parivattanti iti tesu vaṭṭa nāmam āropetvā ti vaṭṭanti vuttam vaṭṭa eka desa ttā vā vaṭṭāni iti vuttāni

original: Sandhīnaṃ ādipariyosānavavatthitāti sandhīnaṃ pubbāparavavatthitāti attho.
analyzed: sandhīnam ādi pariyosāna vavatthitā ati sandhīnam pubba apara vavatthitā ati atthaḥ

original: “Yā kāci vā pana cetanā bhavo, cetanāsampayuttā āyūhanasaṅkhārā”ti idaṃ imissā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇabhājanīye
analyzed: yā kāci vā pana cetanā cetanā sampayuttā āyūhana saṅkhārā ati idam imissā dhamma ṭṭhiti ñāṇa bhājanīye

original: vuttāya paṭisambhidāpāḷiyā vasena vuttaṃ. Ettha hi “cetanā bhavo”ti āgatāti. Bhavaniddese
analyzed: vuttāya paṭisambhidā pāḷiyā vasena vuttam ettha hi cetanā bhavaḥ ti āgatā ati bhava niddese

original: pana “sātthato”ti ettha “cetanāva saṅkhārā, bhavo pana cetanāsampayuttāpī”ti vibhaṅgapāḷiyā
analyzed: pana sā atthato ti ettha cetanā ava saṅkhārāḥ cetanā sampayuttā api iti vibhaṅga pāḷiyā

original: vasena dassitaṃ. “Tattha katamo puññābhisaṅkhāro? Kusalā cetanā kāmāvacarā”tiādinā
analyzed: vasena dassitam tattha katamo puñña abhisaṅkhāro kusalā cetanā kāmāvacarā iti ādinā

original: hi saṅkhārānaṃ cetanābhāvo vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ vuttoti. Tattha paṭisambhidāpāḷiyaṃ “cetanāsampayuttā
analyzed: hi saṅkhārānam cetanā bhāvaḥ vibhaṅga pāḷiyam vuttaḥ ti tattha paṭisambhidā pāḷiyam cetanā sampayuttā

original: vipākadhammattā savipākena āyūhanasaṅkhātena saṅkhatābhisaṅkharaṇakiccena saṅkhārā”ti
analyzed: vipāka dhamma ttā sa vipākena āyūhana saṅkhātena saṅkhata abhisaṅkharaṇa kiccena

original: vuttā. Vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ “sabbampi bhavagāmikammaṃ kammabhavo”ti bhavassa paccayabhāvena
analyzed: vuttā vibhaṅga pāḷiyam sabbam pi bhava gāmi kammam kamma bhavaḥ ti bhavassa paccaya bhāvena

original: bhavagāmibhāvato kammasaṃsaṭṭhasahāyatāya kammabhāvato ca upapattibhavaṃ bhāventīti
analyzed: bhava gāmi bhāvataḥ kamma saṃsaṭṭha sahāya tāya kamma bhāvataḥ ca upapatti bhavam bhāventi iti

original: bhavoti vuttā, upapattibhavabhāvanakiccaṃ pana cetanāya sātisayanti paṭisambhidāpāḷiyaṃ

analyzed: ubhayattha vattum yuttam ti nattha ittha virodhaḥ gahaṇanti kāma upādānam kiccena āha parāmasananti

original: itarāni. Āyūhanāvasāneti tīsupi atthavikappesu vuttassa āyūhanassa avasāne.
analyzed: itarāni āyūhana avasāne ti tīsu pi attha vikappesu vuttassa āyūhanassa avasāne

original: Dvīsu atthavikappesu vutte āyūhanasaṅkhāre “tassa pubbabhāgā”ti āha, tatiye vutte
analyzed: dvīsu attha vikappesu vutte āyūhana saṅkhāre tassa pubba bhāgā ti āha tatiye vutte

analyzed: tad sampayuttā ati daharassa citta ppavatti bhavaṅga bahulā yebhuyyena bhavantara janaka kamma āyūhana samatthā

original: na hotīti “idha paripakkattā āyatanāna”nti vuttaṃ. Kammakaraṇakāle sammohoti etena
analyzed: na hoti iti idha paripakka ttā āyatanānam ti vuttam kamma karaṇa kāle sammoho ti etena

original: Kammāneva vipākaṃ sambharanti vaḍḍhentīti kammasambhārā, kammaṃ vā saṅkhārabhavā,

analyzed: evam samuppannanti kammataḥ vipāko tattha api avijjātaḥ saṅkhārā ti evam samuppannam

original: tisandhiādivasena vā samuppannaṃ idaṃ bhavacakkanti attho. Ittaranti gamanadhammaṃ,

original: evaṃ hetuto dhammamattasambhave hetunirodhā ca vaṭṭupacchede dhamme ca taṃnirodhāya

original: evaṃ brahmacariyañca vijjati, sassatucchedā ca na hontīti samuccayattho. Evañhi hetuāyatte

analyzed: a katvā sabbam pi tam kusala akusalam kammam samudaya saccan ti vuttanti atthaḥ taṇhā

analyzed: cape avasesā ca sa āsavā kusalā dhammā ti hi cetanā cetanā sampayutta visesam a katvā

original: Sukhadukkhatopi cāti sukhādīnaṃ ṭhitivipariṇāmañāṇasukhatāya, vipariṇāmaṭṭhitiaññāṇadukkhatāya ca vuttattā tissopi ca sukhato tissopi ca dukkhato anupassitabbāti attho.
analyzed: sukha dukkhataḥ pi ca ati sukha ādīnam ṭhiti vipariṇāma ñāṇa sukhatāya vipariṇāma ṭṭhiti aññāṇa dukkhatāya ca vuttattā tissaḥ api ca sukhataḥ tissaḥ api ca dukkhataḥ anupassitabbā ti attho

original: Rūpādiārammaṇachandādiadhipatiñāṇādisahajātakāmāvacarādibhūminānattabhedānaṃ kusalākusalatabbipākakiriyānānattabhedassa
analyzed: rūpa ādi ārammaṇa chanda ādi adhipati ñāṇa ādi sahajāta kāmāvacara ādi bhūmi nānatta bhedānam kusala akusala tad vipāka kiriyā nānatta bhedassa

original: ca ādi-saddena sasaṅkhārikāsaṅkhārikasavatthukāvatthukādinānattabhedānañca vasenāti
analyzed: ca ādi saddena vasena ati

original: yojetabbaṃ. Suññatādhammassāti “dhammā honti, khandhā hontī”tiādinā suññatāvāre āgatasuññatāsabhāvassa
analyzed: yojetabbam suñña tā dhammassa ati dhammāḥ honti khandhāḥ honti iti ādinā suñña tā vāre āgata suñña tā sabhāvassa

original: vasena. Kāmañcetthātiādinā pubbe pahīnattā puna pahānaṃ na vattabbanti codanaṃ dasseti,
analyzed: vasena kāmañca itthā tiādinā pubbe pahīna ttā puna pahānam na vattabban ti codanam dasseti

original: maggacittakkhaṇe vā ekattha pahīnaṃ sabbattha pahīnaṃ hotīti visuṃ visuṃ na vattabbanti.
analyzed: magga citta kkhaṇe vā ekattha pahīnam sabbattha pahīnam hoti iti visum visum na vattabbanti

original: Tattha purimacodanāya nānāpuggalaparihāro, pacchimāya nānācittakkhaṇikaparihāro.
analyzed: tattha purima codanāya nānā puggala parihāro pacchimāya nānā cittakkhaṇika parihāro

original: Lokiyabhāvanāya hi kāye pahīnaṃ na vedanādīsu vikkhambhitaṃ hoti. Yadipi na pavatteyya,
analyzed: lokiya bhāvanāya hi kāye pahīnam na vedanā ādīsu vikkhambhitam hoti yadi pi na pavatteyya

original: na paṭipakkhabhāvanāya tattha sā abhijjhādomanassassa appavatti hotīti puna tappahānaṃ
analyzed: na paṭipakkha bhāvanāya tattha sā abhijjhā domanassassa appavatti hoti iti puna tad pahānam

original: vattabbamevāti. Ubhayattha vā ubhayaṃ sambhavato yojetabbaṃ. Ekattha pahīnaṃ sesesupi
analyzed: vattabbam eva ati ubhayattha vā ubhayam sambhavataḥ yojetabbam ekattha pahīnam sesesu pi

original: pahīnaṃ hotīti maggasatipaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ, lokiyabhāvanāya vā sabbattha appavattimattaṃ
analyzed: pahīnam hoti iti magga sati paṭṭhāna bhāvanam lokiya bhāvanāya vā sabbattha appavattimattam

original: sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Pañcapi khandhā loko”ti hi catūsupi vuttanti.
analyzed: sandhāya vuttam pañca api khandhāḥ lokaḥ iti hi catūsu pi vuttan ti

original: Vedanānupassanādiuddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: vedanā anupassanā ādi uddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Uddesavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: uddesa vāra vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Kāyānupassanāniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: kāya anupassanā niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 356. Sabbappakāravacanena uddese dassitā ajjhattādianupassanā pakārā ca gahitā. Tattha
antogadhā cuddasa pakārā, kāyagatāsatisutte vuttā kesādivaṇṇakasiṇārammaṇacatukkajjhānappakārā,
analyzed: antogadhā cuddasa pakārā kāyagata asati sutte vuttā kesa ādi vaṇṇa kasiṇa ārammaṇa catukka jhāna ppakārā

original: lokiyādippakārā cāti tepi gahitā eva. Niddese hi ekappakāraniddesena nidassanamattaṃ
analyzed: lokiya ādi ppakārā ca ati te pi gahitāḥ eva niddese hi eka ppakāra niddesena nidassana mattam

original: katanti, sabbappakāraggahaṇañca bāhiresupi ekadesasambhavato katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: kata nti sabba ppakāra ggahaṇam ca bāhiresu pi eka desa sambhavato kata nti daṭṭhabbam

original: Tiriyaṃ tacaparicchinnanti ettha nanu kesalomanakhānaṃ atacaparicchinnatā tacassa
analyzed: tiriyam taca paricchinnan ti ettha nanu kesa loma nakhānam a taca paricchinna tā tacassa

original: ca atthīti? Yadipi atthi, tacaparicchinnabahulatāya pana tacaparicchinnatā na na
analyzed: ca atthi iti yadi api atthi taca paricchinna bahula tāya pana taca paricchinna tā na na

original: hoti kāyassāti evaṃ vuttaṃ. Taco pariyanto assāti tacapariyantoti vuttoti etena pana
analyzed: hoti kāyassa ati evam vuttam tacaḥ pariyantaḥ assa ati taca pariyantaḥ iti vuttaḥ ti etena pana

original: vacanena kāyekadesabhūto taco gahito eva. Tappaṭibaddhā ca kesādayo tadanupaviṭṭhamūlā
analyzed: vacanena kāya ekadeśa bhūtaḥ tacaḥ gahitaḥ eva tad paṭibaddhā ca kesa ādayaḥ tad an upaviṭṭha mūlā

original: tacapariyantāva hontīti dvattiṃsākārasamūho sabbopi kāyo tacapariyantoti vuttoti veditabbo.
analyzed: taca pariyantā ava honti iti dvattiṃsa ākāra samūho sabbaḥ api kāyo taca pariyanto ti vutto ti veditabbaḥ

original: “Pūraṃ nānappakārassā”ti vuttaṃ, ke pana te pakārā? Yehi nānappakāraṃ asuci vuttanti
analyzed: pūram nānā pakārassa ati vuttam ke pana te pakārāḥ yehi nānā pakāram asuci vuttan ti

original: kesā lomātiādi vuttanti imamatthaṃ dīpento āha “ete kesādayo ākārā”ti. Ākārā pakārāti hi eko attho.
analyzed: kesāḥ loma atiādi vuttanti imam attham dīpentaḥ āha ete kesa ādayaḥ ākārā ati ākārā pakārā ati hi ekaḥ atthaḥ

original: Nisinnassa yāva aparipphandanisajjāmūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjati, yāvatā uṭṭhāti vā,
analyzed: nisinnassa yāva a paripphanda nisajjā mūlakam dukkham uppajjati yāvatā uṭṭhāti vā

original: tāva eko nisajjavāro. Yena vidhinā uggahe kusalo hoti, so sattavidho vidhi “uggahakosalla”nti
analyzed: tāva ekaḥ nisajja vāraḥ yena vidhinā uggahe kusalaḥ hoti so sattavidhaḥ vidhi uggaha kosallanti

original: vuccati, taṃnibbattaṃ vā ñāṇaṃ.
analyzed: vuccati tad nibbattam vā ñāṇam

original: Pathavīdhātubahulabhāvato matthaluṅgassa karīsāvasāne tantiāropanamāha. Ettha pana
analyzed: pathavī dhātu bahula bhāvataḥ matthaluṅgassa karīsa avasāne tanti āropanam āha ettha pana

original: maṃsaṃ…pe… vakkaṃ…pe… kesāti evaṃ vakkapañcakādīsu anulomasajjhāyaṃ vatvā paṭilomasajjhāyo
analyzed: evam vakka pañcaka ādīsu anuloma sajjhāyam vatvā paṭiloma sajjhāyaḥ

original: purimehi sambandho vutto. Svāyaṃ ye parato visuṃ tipañcāhaṃ, purimehi ekato tipañcāhanti
analyzed: purimehi sambandhaḥ vuttaḥ svāyam ye paratas visum ti pañca aham purimehi ekatas ti pañca aham ti

original: chapañcāhaṃ sajjhāyā vakkhamānā, tesu ādiantadassanavasena vuttoti daṭṭhabbo. Anulomapaṭilomasajjhāyepi
analyzed: cha pañcāham sajjhāyā vakkhamānā tesu ādi anta dassana vasena vuttaḥ ti daṭṭhabbaḥ anuloma paṭiloma sajjhāye pi

original: hi paṭilomasajjhāyo antimoti. Sajjhāyappakārantaraṃ vā etampīti veditabbaṃ. Hatthasaṅkhalikā
analyzed: hi paṭiloma sajjhāyaḥ antimaḥ ti sajjhāya ppakāra antaram vā etam pi iti veditabbam hatthasaṅkhalikā

original: aṅgulipanti. Lakkhaṇapaṭivedhassāti asubhalakkhaṇapaṭivedhassa, dhātulakkhaṇapaṭivedhassa vā.
analyzed: lakkhaṇa paṭivedhassa ati asubha lakkhaṇa paṭivedhassa dhātu lakkhaṇa paṭivedhassa vā

original: Attano bhāgo sabhāgo, sabhāgena paricchedo sabhāgaparicchedo, heṭṭhuparitiriyantehi sakakoṭṭhāsikakesantarādīhi ca paricchedoti attho.
analyzed: attanaḥ bhāgo sa bhāgaḥ sabhāgena paricchedo sa bhāga paricchedo heṭṭhu paritiriyantehi saka koṭṭhāsika kesantara ādīhi ca paricchedo ti attho

original: Dhātuvibhaṅgo pukkusātisuttaṃ. Sādhāraṇavasenāti ettakeneva siddhe sabba-ggahaṇaṃ vaṇṇakasiṇavasena catukkajjhānikasamathasādhāraṇattassa ca dassanatthaṃ.
analyzed: dhātu vibhaṅgaḥ pukkusāti suttam sādhāraṇa vasena ati ettakena iva siddhe sabba ggahaṇam vaṇṇa kasiṇa vasena ca dassana ttham

original: Okkamanavissajjananti paṭipajjitabbavajjetabbe maggeti attho. Bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇeti
analyzed: okkamana vissajjanan ti paṭipajjitabba vajjetabbe magge ti atthaḥ bahiddhā puthuttā ārammaṇā iti

original: ettha kāyānupassanaṃ hitvā subhādivasena gayhamānā kesādayopi bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇānevāti
analyzed: ettha kāya anupassanam hitvā subha ādi vasena gayhamānā kesa ādayaḥ api bahiddhā puthutta ārammaṇān eva āti

original: veditabbā. Ukkuṭṭhukkaṭṭhiṭṭhāneyeva uṭṭhahitvāti pubbe viya ekattha katāya ukkuṭṭhiyā
analyzed: veditabbā ukkuṭṭha ukkaṭṭhi ṭhāneyā iva uṭṭhahitvā ti pubbe viya ekattha katāya ukkuṭṭhiyā

original: kamena sabbatālesu patitvā uṭṭhahitvā pariyantatālaṃ āditālañca agantvā tato tato
analyzed: kamena sabba tālesu patitvā uṭṭhahitvā pariyanta tālam ādi tālam ca a gantvā tato tato

original: tattha tattheva katāya ukkuṭṭhiyā uṭṭhahitvāti attho.
analyzed: tattha tattha iva katāya ukkuṭṭhiyā uṭṭhahitvā ati attho

original: Adhicittanti samathavipassanācittaṃ. Anuyuttenāti yuttapayuttena, bhāventenāti attho.
analyzed: adhicittam ti samatha vipassanā cittam anuyuttena ati yutta payuttena bhāventena ati attho

original: Samādhinimittaṃ upalakkhaṇākāro samādhiyeva. Manasi kātabbanti citte kātabbaṃ, uppādetabbanti
analyzed: samādhi nimittam upalakkhaṇa ākāraḥ samādhiyā iva manasi kātabbanti citte kātabbam uppādetabbanti

original: attho. Samādhikāraṇaṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ samādhinimittaṃ āvajjitabbanti attho. Ṭhānaṃ atthīti
analyzed: atthaḥ samādhi kāraṇam vā ārammaṇam samādhi nimittam āvajjitabbanti atthaḥ ṭhānam atthi iti

original: vacanaseso, taṃ cittaṃ kosajjāya saṃvatteyya, etassa saṃvattanassa kāraṇaṃ atthīti
analyzed: vacana sesaḥ tam cittam kosajjāya saṃvatteyyaḥ etassa saṃvattanassa kāraṇam atthi iti

original: attho. Taṃ vā manasikaraṇaṃ cittaṃ kosajjāya saṃvatteyyāti etassa ṭhānaṃ kāraṇanti
analyzed: attho tam vā manasikaraṇam cittam kosajjāya saṃvatteyya ati etassa ṭhānam kāraṇan ti

original: attho. Na ca pabhaṅgūti kammaniyabhāvūpagamanena ca pabhijjanasabhāvanti attho.
analyzed: attho na ca pabhaṅgū ti kamma niya bhāva upagamanena ca pabhijjana sabhāvanti attho

original: Ālimpetīti ādīpeti jāleti. Tañcāti taṃ piḷandhanavikatisaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ payojanaṃ.
analyzed: ālimpeti iti ādīpeti jāleti tam ca ati tam piḷandhana vikati saṅkhātam attham payojanam

original: Assāti suvaṇṇakārassa anubhoti sambhoti sādheti. Assa vā suvaṇṇassa taṃ atthaṃ suvaṇṇakāro anubhoti pāpuṇāti.
analyzed: assa ati suvaṇṇa kārassa anubhoti sambhoti sādheti assa vā suvaṇṇassa tam attham suvaṇṇa kāraḥ anubhoti pāpuṇāti

original: Abhiññāya iddhividhādiñāṇena sacchikaraṇīyassa iddhividhapaccanubhavanādikassa abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyassa.
analyzed: abhiññāya iddhividha ādi ñāṇena sacchikaraṇīyassa iddhividha paccanubhavana ādikassa abhiññā sacchikaraṇīyassa

original: Paccakkhaṃ yassa atthi, so sakkhi, sakkhino bhabbatā sakkhibhabbatā, sakkhibhavanatāti
analyzed: paccakkham yassa atthi so sakkhi sakkhinaḥ bhabba tā sakkhi bhabba tā sakkhi bhavana tā ti

original: vuttaṃ hoti. Sakkhi ca so bhabbo cāti vā sakkhibhabbo. Ayañhi iddhividhādīnaṃ bhabbo,
analyzed: vuttam hoti sakkhi ca saḥ bhabbaḥ ca ati vā sakkhibhabbaḥ ayañhi iddhividha ādīnam bhabbaḥ

original: tattha ca sakkhīti sakkhibhabbo, tassa bhāvo sakkhibhabbatā, taṃ pāpuṇāti. Āyataneti
analyzed: tattha ca sakkhi iti sakkhibhabbaḥ tassa bhāvaḥ sakkhibhabba tā tam pāpuṇāti āyatane iti

original: pubbahetādike kāraṇe sati.
analyzed: pubba hetā ādike kāraṇe sati

original: Sītibhāvanti nibbānaṃ, kilesadarathavūpasamaṃ vā. Sampahaṃsetīti samapavattaṃ cittaṃ
analyzed: sīti bhāvanti nibbānam kilesa daratha vūpasamam vā sampahaṃseti iti sama pavattam cittam

original: tathāpavattiyā paññāya toseti uttejeti. Yadā vā nirassādaṃ cittaṃ bhāvanāya na pakkhandati,
analyzed: tathā pavattiyā paññāya toseti uttejeti yadā vā nirassādam cittam bhāvanāya na pakkhandati

original: tadā jātiādīni saṃvegavatthūni paccavekkhitvā sampahaṃseti samuttejeti.
analyzed: tadā jāti ādīni saṃvega vatthūni paccavekkhitvā sampahaṃseti samuttejeti

original: Tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnā, kathaṃ? Dve kesā ekato natthīti. Āsayoti nissayo, paccayoti attho.
analyzed: tiriyam aññamaññena paricchinnā katham dve kesā ekatas natthi iti āsayo ti nissayo paccayo ti attho

original: Nakhā tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnāti visuṃ vavatthitataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tameva hi atthaṃ dassetuṃ “dve nakhā ekato natthī”ti āhāti.
analyzed: nakhā tiriyam aññamaññena paricchinnā ati visum sandhāya vuttam tam eva hi attham dassetum dve nakhā ekatas natthi iti āha ati

original: Sukhumampīti yathāvuttaoḷārikacammato sukhumaṃ antomukhacammādi. Koṭṭhāsesu vā tacena
analyzed: sukhumam pi iti yathā vutta oḷārika cammato sukhumam antomukha camma ādi koṭṭhāsesu vā tacena

original: paricchinnattā yaṃ durupalakkhaṇīyaṃ, taṃ “sukhuma”nti vuttaṃ. Tañhi vuttanayena
analyzed: paricchinna ttā yam durupalakkhaṇīyam tam sukhuman ti vuttam tat hi vutta nayena

original: tacaṃ vivaritvā passantassa pākaṭaṃ hotīti.
analyzed: tacam vivaritvā passantassa pākaṭam hoti iti

original: Tālaguḷapaṭalaṃ nāma pakkatālaphalalasikaṃ tālapaṭṭikāya limpitvā sukkhāpetvā uddharitvā gahitapaṭalaṃ.
analyzed: tālaguḷapaṭalam nāma pakka tāla phala lasikam tāla paṭṭikāya limpitvā sukkhāpetvā uddharitvā gahita paṭalam

original: Evaṃ timattānīti evaṃ-matta-saddehi gopphakaṭṭhikādīni avuttānipi dassetīti veditabbaṃ. Kīḷāgoḷakāni suttena bandhitvā aññamaññaṃ ghaṭṭetvā kīḷanagoḷakāni.
analyzed: evam ti mattāni iti evaṃmatta saddehi goppha kaṭṭhikā ādīni avuttāni api dasseti iti veditabbam kīḷā goḷakāni suttena bandhitvā aññamaññam ghaṭṭetvā kīḷana goḷakāni

original: Tattha jaṅghaṭṭhikassa patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānanti jaṇṇukaṭṭhimhi pavisitvā ṭhitaṭṭhānanti
analyzed: tattha jaṅghaṭṭhikassa patiṭṭhita ṭhānanti jaṇṇuka ṭṭhimhi pavisitvā ṭhita ṭhānanti

original: adhippāyo. Tena aṭṭhinā patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ yaṃ kaṭiṭṭhino, taṃ aggachinnamahāpunnāgaphalasadisaṃ.
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ tena aṭṭhinā patiṭṭhita ṭṭhānam yam kaṭiṭṭhinaḥ tam agga chinna mahā punnāga phala sadisam

original: Sīsakapaṭṭaveṭhakaṃ veṭhetvā ṭhapitasīsamayaṃ paṭṭakaṃ. Suttakantanasalākāviddhā
analyzed: sīsaka paṭṭa veṭhakam veṭhetvā ṭhapita sīsa mayam paṭṭakam sutta kantana salākā viddhā

original: goḷakā vaṭṭanāti vuccanti, vaṭṭanānaṃ āvali vaṭṭanāvali. Avalekhanasatthakaṃ ucchutacāvalekhanasatthakaṃ.
analyzed: goḷakāḥ vaṭṭanā ti vuccanti vaṭṭanānam āvali vaṭṭana āvali avalekhana satthakam ucchutaca avalekhana satthakam

original: Vakkabhāgena paricchinnanti vakkapariyantabhāgena paricchinnaṃ.
analyzed: vakka bhāgena vakka pariyanta bhāgena paricchinnam

original: Sakkharasudhāvaṇṇanti marumpehi katasudhāvaṇṇaṃ. “Setasakkharasudhāvaṇṇa”nti ca pāṭhaṃ vadanti, setasakkharāvaṇṇaṃ sudhāvaṇṇañcāti attho.
analyzed: sakkhara sudhā vaṇṇam ti marumpehi kata sudhā vaṇṇam seta sakkhara sudhā vaṇṇam iti ca pāṭham vadanti seta sakkhara āvaṇṇam sudhā vaṇṇam ca ati attho

original: Yattha annapānaṃ nipatitvā tiṭṭhatīti sambandho.
analyzed: yattha anna pānam nipatitvā tiṭṭhati iti sambandhaḥ

original: Visamacchinnakalāpo visamaṃ udakaṃ paggharati, evameva sarīraṃ kesakūpādivivarehi upari heṭṭhā tiriyañca visamaṃ paggharatīti dassetuṃ visamacchinna-ggahaṇaṃ karoti.
analyzed: visama chinna kalāpaḥ visamam udakam paggharati evam eva sarīram kesakūpa ādi vivarehi upari heṭṭhā tiriyam ca visamam paggharati iti dassetum visama chinna ggahaṇam karoti

original: Atikaṭukaaccuṇhādiko visabhāgāhāro uṇhakāle pavattamānānaṃ dhātūnaṃ visabhāgattā.
analyzed: ati kaṭuka accuṇha ādikaḥ visa bhāga āhāraḥ uṇha kāle pavattamānānam dhātūnam visa bhāga ttā

original: Ekattārammaṇabaleneva vāti vikkhambhitanīvaraṇena susamāhitacittena upaṭṭhitassa
analyzed: ekatta ārammaṇa balena iva vāti vikkhambhita nīvaraṇena su samāhita cittena upaṭṭhitassa

original: nānārammaṇavipphandanavirahena ekasabhāvassa ārammaṇassa vasena. Tañhi ekattārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: nānā ārammaṇa vipphandana virahena eka sabhāvassa ārammaṇassa vasena tat hi ekatta ārammaṇam

original: upaṭṭhahamānameva attani abhiratiṃ, sātisayaṃ pharaṇapītiṃ, iṭṭhākārānubhavanañca
analyzed: upaṭṭhahamānam eva abhiratim sa atisayam pharaṇa pītim iṭṭha ākāra anubhavanam ca

original: somanassaṃ uppādeti. Na hi abhiratisomanassehi vinā anatikkantapītisukhassa ekattupaṭṭhānaṃ atthīti.
analyzed: somanassam uppādeti na hi abhirati somanassehi vinā an atikkanta pīti sukhassa ekattupaṭṭhānam atthi iti

original: Avisesato pana sādhāraṇavasenāti paṭikūladhātuvaṇṇavisesaṃ akatvā samathavipassanāsādhāraṇavasenāti
analyzed: avisesato pana sādhāraṇa vasena ati paṭikūla dhātu vaṇṇa visesam a katvā samatha vipassanā sādhāraṇa vasena ati

analyzed: apagamaḥ eva apagama vimokkho

analyzed: vuṭṭhānam ti imāya vuṭṭhāna pāḷiyā asaṅgahita ttā nirodha samāpattiyā vuṭṭhānam pāḷimuttaka vuṭṭhānam

original: Dasamabalaniddesavaṇṇanā
831. Rāgādīhi cetaso vimuttibhūto samādhi cetovimutti. Paññāva vimutti paññāvimutti.
analyzed: rāga ādīhi cetasaḥ vimutti bhūto samādhi cetas vimutti

analyzed: niraya ādi nibbāna gāmini paṭipada abhūte kammanti gahetvā āha kamma paricchedam eva ati

original: Appetuṃ na sakkoti aṭṭhamanavamabalāni viya, taṃsadisaṃ iddhividhañāṇaṃ viya vikubbituṃ.
analyzed: appetum na sakkoti aṭṭhama navama balāni viya taṃsadisam iddhividha ñāṇam viya vikubbitum

original: Etena dasabalasadisatañca vāreti, jhānādiñāṇaṃ viya vā appetuṃ vikubbituñca. Yadipi
analyzed: etena dasa bala sadisa tam ca jhāna ādi ñāṇam viya vā appetum vikubbitum ca yadi api

original: hi jhānādipaccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ sattamabalanti tassa savitakkasavicāratā vuttā, tathāpi

analyzed: khuddaka vatthu vibhaṅgaḥ

original: 1. Ekakamātikādivaṇṇanā
832. “Tettiṃsati tikā”ti vuttaṃ, te pana pañcatiṃsa. Tathā “purisamalādayo aṭṭha
analyzed: tettiṃsati tikā iti vuttam te pana pañcatiṃsa tathā purisa mala ādayo aṭṭha

analyzed: navakā iti vuttam te pana āghāta vatthu ādayaḥ nava ye dve aṭṭhārasakā iti ādimhi vuttā

original: te eva “iti atītāni chattiṃsā”tiādinā tayo chattiṃsakā katāti āha “cha aṭṭhārasakā”ti,

original: Ekakamātikādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: ekaka mātikā ādi vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: (1.) Ekakaniddesavaṇṇanā
843-844. Atthi paṭiccaṃ nāmāti yathā “cakkhuñca paṭiccā”tiādīsu nissayādipaccayabhāvena
analyzed: atthi paṭiccam nāma ati yathā cakkhum ca paṭicca ati ādīsu nissaya ādi paccaya bhāvena

analyzed: paṭicca iti vuttam na tathā idha khattiya ādi jātīnam paramatthataḥ avijjamānānam nissaya ādi paccayattassa

original: khattiyādijātiyā atthitā, sā idha paṭicca-saddena vibhāvitāti attho. Ekissā seṇiyāti

original: asambhinnāyāti attho.
analyzed: a sambhinnāya ati atthaḥ

original: Pañhavissajjanādikiriyāsu purato karaṇaṃ purekkhāro. Nikkheparāsīti nidhānarāsi.
analyzed: pañha vissajjana ādi kiriyāsu puratas karaṇam purekkhāraḥ nikkhepa rāsi iti nidhāna rāsi

original: Patthaṭākittinoti vitthiṇṇākittino. Rattaññumadoti purāṇaññutāmadoti vadanti. Cirarattijātena,
analyzed: patthaṭākittino ti vitthiṇṇākittinaḥ rattaññu mado ti purāṇaññu tā mado ti vadanti cira ratti jātena

original: cirarattipabbajitena vā jānitabbassa, rattīnameva vā jānanamado. Upaṭṭhāpakamānoti
analyzed: cira ratti pabbajitena vā jānitabbassa rattīnam eva vā jānana madaḥ upaṭṭhāpaka mānaḥ ti

original: āṇākaraṇamāno. Āṇākaraṇañhi vicāraṇaṃ idha “yaso”ti vuttanti. Parimaṇḍalattabhāvanissito
analyzed: āṇākaraṇa mānaḥ āṇākaraṇam hi vicāraṇam idha vuttanti parimaṇḍalatta bhāva nissito

original: māno pariṇāhamado. Sarīrasampattipāripūriyā mado pāripūrimado.
analyzed: māno pariṇāha madaḥ sarīra sampatti pāripūriyā mado pāripūri madaḥ

original: 845. Vatthunā vināpi vattabbatāya avatthukaṃ, na vatthuno abhāvā.
analyzed: vatthunā vinā api vattabbatāya avatthukam na vatthunaḥ abhāvā

original: 846. Cittassa vossajjananti cittassa satito muccanaṃ, kāyaduccaritādīsu pakkhandanaṃ
analyzed: cittassa vossajjananti cittassa satitaḥ muccanam kāya duccarita ādīsu pakkhandanam

original: vā vossaggo. Patiṭṭhābhāvoti kusalakaraṇe aṭṭhānaṃ, anuṭṭhānanti attho. Pamādasaṅkhātassa
analyzed: vā vossaggaḥ patiṭṭhā bhāvo ti kusala karaṇe aṭṭhānam anuṭṭhānam ti attho pamāda saṅkhātassa

original: atthassa kāyaduccarite cittassa vossaggo pāṇātipāte micchādiṭṭhiyaṃ kodhe upanāheti
analyzed: atthassa kāya duccarite cittassa vossaggo pāṇātipāte micchādiṭṭhiyam kodhe upanāheti

original: evamādiko pariyāyo apariyanto, tadatthatappariyāyappakāsako vossagganissaggādiko
analyzed: evamādiko pariyāyaḥ a pariyantaḥ tad attha tad pariyāya ppakāsako vossagga nissagga ādiko

original: byañjanapariyāyo cāti sabbaṃ taṃ saṅkhipitvā evarūpoti idaṃ ākāranidassanaṃ sabbapariyāyassa
analyzed: byañjana pariyāyaḥ ca ati sabbam tam saṅkhipitvā evarūpaḥ ti idam ākāra nidassanam sabba pariyāyassa

original: vattuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā katanti dassento āha “pariyantābhāvato”ti. Vissaṭṭhākāroti
analyzed: vattum asakkuṇeyya ttā katanti dassentaḥ āha pariyanta abhāvato ti vissaṭṭha ākārā iti

original: satiyā paccanīkabhūte cattāro khandhe dasseti.
analyzed: satiyā paccanīka bhūte cattāro khandhe dasseti

original: 847. Cittassa thaddhatā tathāpavattacittamevāti vadanti, mānaviseso vā daṭṭhabbo. Upasaṅkamane vanditabbaṃ hotīti pariyanteneva carati.
analyzed: cittassa thaddha tā tathā pavatta cittam eva ati vadanti māna visesaḥ vā daṭṭhabbo upasaṅkamane vanditabbam hoti iti pariyantena iva carati

original: 848. “Āpattiṃ āpannosī”ti vutte “āvuso, tvaṃ āpannosī”tiādinā tena vuttaṃ tasseva
analyzed: āpattim āpannā asi iti vutte āvuso tvam āpannā asi iti ādinā tena vuttam tassa eva

original: upari khipanavasena “paṭippharitvā”ti vadanti. “Tasmiṃ nāma dalidde, akusale vā idaṃ
analyzed: upari khipana vasena paṭippharitvā iti vadanti tasmin nāma dalidde akusale vā idam

original: karonte ahaṃ kasmā na karomī”ti evaṃ idha paṭippharaṇaṃ yuttaṃ. Karaṇassa uttarakiriyā
analyzed: karonte aham kasmai na karomi iti evam idha paṭippharaṇam yuttam karaṇassa uttara kiriyā

original: karaṇuttariyaṃ. Akusalapakkho esāti sārambhoti adhippāyo.
analyzed: karaṇa uttariyam akusala pakkhaḥ esā ati sa ārambhā ti adhippāyo

original: 849. Aticca icchatīti aticciccho, tassa bhāvo aticcicchatāti vattabbe cci-kāralopaṃ
analyzed: aticcaḥ icchati iti aticcicchaḥ tassa bhāvaḥ vattabbe ccikāra lopam
