analyzed: katvā vuttam atricchatā iti ca sā eva vuccati iti tatra api neruttika vidhānena

original: padasiddhi veditabbā. Yathāladdhaṃ vā atikkamitvā atra atra icchanaṃ atricchatā,
analyzed: pada siddhi veditabbā yathā laddham vā atikkamitvā atra atra icchanam atricchatā

original: sā eva ra-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā “aticchatā”ti vuttā.
analyzed: sā eva rakārassa takāram katvā aticchatā iti vuttā

original: Atricchanti aticchaṃ, atra vā icchanto. Kena? Atilobhena atilobhamicchāsaṅkhātena
analyzed: atricchanti aticcham atra vai ati lobhena ati lobham icchā saṅkhātena

original: atilobhamadena ca. Attano hitaṃ attāti vuttaṃ. Hāyati jīrati, ādiṇṇo vā attā, patto
analyzed: ati lobha madena ca attanaḥ hitam attā ati vuttam hāyati jīrati ādiṇṇaḥ vā attā patto

original: vā attā, naṃ jīrati candakinnariṃ patthayitvā asitābhūdeviyā vihīno viya.
analyzed: vā attā nam jīrati candakinnarim patthayitvā asitābhūdeviyā vihīnaḥ

original: Icchāhatassāti icchāya upaddutassa, mudditassa vā.
analyzed: icchā hatassa ati icchāya upaddutassa mudditassa vā

original: Atihīḷayānoti avamaññamāno. Malakanti evaṃnāmakaṃ janapadaṃ, abbhokāsaṃ vā. Kodaṇḍakenāti kudaṇḍakena rassadaṇḍakena. Gaddulenāti ca vadanti. Ruhiramakkhitaṅgoti ruhirasinnagatto.
analyzed: ati hīḷayānaḥ iti avamaññamānaḥ malakam ti evaṃnāmakam janapadam abbhokāsam vā kodaṇḍakena ati kudaṇḍakena rassadaṇḍakena gaddulena ati ca vadanti ruhira makkhitaṅgo ti ruhira sinna gatto

original: 850. Jānantasseva bhiyyo bhiyyo codento viya sambhāvetukāmo hoti. Paccayeti upādānādipaccaye.
analyzed: jānantassa iva bhiyyas bhiyyas codentaḥ viya sambhāvetu kāmaḥ hoti paccaye iti upādāna ādi paccaye

original: 851. Ye patirūpena vañcenti, te gaṇṭhikā, durācārena vā gaṇṭhibhūtā. Gaṇṭhikaputtā
analyzed: ye pati rūpena vañcenti te gaṇṭhikāḥ durācārena vā gaṇṭhi bhūtāḥ gaṇṭhika puttā

original: nāma gaṇṭhikā eva honti, tena saddhivihārikā gaṇṭhikabhāvena “thero…pe… dīghacaṅkame
analyzed: nāma gaṇṭhikāḥ eva honti tena saddhivihārikāḥ gaṇṭhika bhāvena therope dīghacaṅkame

original: viharatī”ti vadanti.
analyzed: viharati iti vadanti

original: Vaṭṭati bhanteti ayampi eko pakāro, lābhinā eva pana sakkā ñātunti attano samāpattilābhitaṃ
analyzed: vaṭṭati bhante ti ayam pi ekaḥ pakāraḥ lābhinā eva pana sakkā ñātun ti attanaḥ samāpatti lābhitam

original: sūcetīti attho. Pañcattayaṃ nāma uparipaṇṇāsake dutiyasuttaṃ. Tassa gambhīrattā vadati
analyzed: sūcā iti iti attho pañcattayam nāma upari paṇṇāsake dutiya suttam tassa gambhīra ttā vadati

original: “pañcattayaṃ olokentassā”ti.
analyzed: pañcattayam olokentassa āti

original: 852. Siṅganti siṅgāraṃ. Tañhi kusalassa vijjhanato samāsevitatāya sīse parikkhataṃ sunikhataṃ visāṇaṃ viya, thirattā ca siṅgaṃ viyāti siṅgaṃ, taṃ panatthato rāgo.
analyzed: siṅganti siṅgāram tat hi kusalassa samāsevita tāya sīse parikkhatam su nikhatam visāṇam viya thira ttā ca siṅgam viyāti siṅgam tam pana atthataḥ rāgaḥ

original: 853. Temanakaraṇatthe tintiṇa-saddo daṭṭhabbo. Khīyananti ca yena lobhena paraṃ mamanti
analyzed: temana karaṇa atthe tintiṇa saddo daṭṭhabbo ca yena lobhena param mamanti

original: vadantaṃ khīyati, so vutto. Khīyanaṃ bhaṇḍananti ca vadanti. Tintiṇanti vā loluppamicceva
analyzed: vadantam khīyati saḥ vuttaḥ khīyanam bhaṇḍananti ca vadanti tintiṇanti vā loluppam icca eva

original: vuttaṃ hoti. Saññā-saddo hi eso loluppavācakoti.
analyzed: vuttam hoti saññā saddo hi eso loluppa vācakaḥ ti

original: 854. Ūruppamāṇāpīti etena mahantaghanabhāvena apūtitaṃ dasseti. Athavātiādinā cīvaramaṇḍanādīnaṃ
analyzed: ūru pamāṇā api iti etena mahanta ghana bhāvena apūti tam dasseti athavā ati ādinā cīvara maṇḍana ādīnam

original: visesanāni “imassa vā pūtikāyassa bāhirānaṃ vā parikkhārānaṃ maṇḍanā”tiādīnīti dasseti.
analyzed: visesanāni imassa vā pūti kāyassa bāhirānam vā parikkhārānam maṇḍana ati ādīni iti dasseti

original: Cīvarena hi maṇḍanā cīvaramaṇḍanā, cīvarassa vā maṇḍanā cīvaramaṇḍanā, evaṃ pattamaṇḍanā
analyzed: cīvarena hi maṇḍanā cīvara maṇḍanā cīvarassa vā maṇḍanā cīvara maṇḍanā evam patta maṇḍanā

original: senāsanamaṇḍanā cāti adhippāyo. Ūnaṭṭhānapūraṇaṃ chavirāgasusaṇṭhānādikaraṇañca cīvarādīsu
analyzed: senāsana maṇḍanā ca ati adhippāyaḥ ūna ṭṭhāna pūraṇam chavi rāga su saṇṭhāna ādi karaṇam ca cīvara ādīsu

original: kāye ca yathāyogaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Tadahujātadārako viya hotīti dārakacāpalyaṃ na muñcatīti attho.
analyzed: kāye ca yathāyogam yojetabbam tad ahu jāta dārakaḥ viya hoti iti dāraka cāpalyam na muñcati iti attho

original: 855. Sadisā anurūpā bhatti sabhāgo, na sabhāgo asabhāgo, mānathaddhatā, virodho vā. Tenassa mātādīsu vattanaṃ asabhāgavuttitā. Evaṃvidhānaṃ mānādhikānaṃ akusalānamidaṃ nāmaṃ.
analyzed: sadisāḥ anurūpāḥ sabhāgaḥ na sabhāgaḥ asabhāgaḥ māna thaddha tā virodhaḥ vā tena assa mātā ādīsu vattanam asabhāga vutti tā evaṃvidhānam māna adhikānam akusalānam idam nāmam

original: 856. Paritassitāti saṅkampanā, ukkaṇṭhitassa vā tassa tassa taṇhāyanā.
analyzed: paritassitā ati saṅkampanā ukkaṇṭhitassa vā tassa tassa taṇhāyanā

original: 857. Kusalakaraṇe kāyassa avipphārikatā līnatā jātiālasyaṃ, na rogautubhojanādīhi
analyzed: kusala karaṇe kāyassa a vipphārika tā līna tā jāti ālasyam na roga autubhojana ādīhi

original: kāyagelaññaṃ tandī nāma, atha kho pakatiālasyanti attho. Kāyālasiyanti nāmakāyassa
analyzed: kāyagelaññam tandī nāma atha kho pakati ālasyanti attho kāyālasiyanti nāma kāyassa

original: ālasiyaṃ, tadeva rūpakāyassāpīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: ālasiyam tat eva rūpa kāyassa api iti daṭṭhabbam

original: 858. Accasanādīhi uppannadhātukkhobhanimittaṃ ālasiyaṃ vijambhitā.
analyzed: accasana ādīhi uppanna dhātu kkhobha nimittam ālasiyam vijambhi tā

original: 859. Bhattanimittena uppannaṃ ālasyaṃ bhattasammado.
analyzed: bhatta nimittena uppannam ālasyam bhatta sammadaḥ

original: 860. Imehi panāti cittassa akalyatādīhi. Sabbattha kilesavasenāti thinamiddhakāraṇānaṃ rāgādīnaṃ vasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: imehi pana ati cittassa akalya tā ādīhi sabbattha kilesa vasena ati thinam iddha kāraṇānam rāga ādīnam vasena ati daṭṭhabbam

original: 861. Sammāājīvato apeto katoti apakato. So ājīvupaddavena upaddutoti katvā āha “upaddutassāti attho”ti.
analyzed: sammāājīvataḥ apetaḥ katoti apakato so ājīva upaddavena upaddutoti katvā āha upaddutassa ati attho ti

original: Tividhampi taṃ tattha āgataṃ tassa nissayabhūtāya imāya pāḷiyā dassetunti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: tividham pi tam tattha āgatam tassa nissaya bhūtāya imāya pāḷiyā dassetun ti evamatthaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Pāpaṇikānīti āpaṇato chaḍḍitāni. Nantakānīti antarahitāni, cīrāni vā. Gilānassa paccayabhūtā
analyzed: pāpaṇikāni iti āpaṇataḥ chaḍḍitāni nantakāni iti anta rahitāni cīrāni vā gilānassa paccaya bhūtā

original: bhesajjasaṅkhātā jīvitaparikkhārā gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā. Pūtimuttanti purāṇassa
analyzed: bhesajja saṅkhātāḥ jīvita parikkhārāḥ gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhārā pūti muttanti purāṇassa

original: apurāṇassa ca sabbassa gomuttassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Pūtibhāvena chaḍḍitosadhantipi keci.
analyzed: apurāṇassa ca sabbassa gomuttassa etam nāmam pūti bhāvena keci

original: Agabbhikā ekadvārā dīghasālā kira uddaṇḍo. Kucchitarajabhūtāya pāpicchatāya niratthakakāyavacīvipphandaniggahaṇaṃ
analyzed: agabbhikā eka dvārā dīghasālā kira uddaṇḍo kucchita raja bhūtāya pāpa icchatāya niratthaka kāya vacī vipphanda niggahaṇam

original: korajaṃ, taṃ etassa atthīti korajiko, ativiya korajiko korajikakorajiko. Atiparisaṅkitoti
analyzed: korajam tam etassa atthi iti korajikaḥ ativiya korajikaḥ korajika korajikaḥ atiparisaṅkitaḥ iti

original: keci. Mukhasambhāvitoti korajikakorajikādibhāvena pavattavacanehi attano mukhamattena
analyzed: keci korajika korajika ādi bhāvena pavatta vacanehi attanaḥ mukha mattena

original: aññehi sambhāvito. So evarūpo evarūpatāya eva attānaṃ paraṃ viya katvā “ayaṃ samaṇo”tiādiṃ katheti.
analyzed: aññehi sambhāvito saḥ evarūpaḥ evarūpa tāya eva attānam param viya katvā ayam samaṇa uti ādim kathā iti

original: Paṇidhāyāti “arahāti maṃ jānantū”ti cittaṃ ṭhapetvā, patthetvā vā. Āpāthakajjhāyīti manussānaṃ āpāthaṭṭhāne samādhiṃ samāpanno viya nisīdanto āpāthake janassa pākaṭaṭṭhāne jhāyī.
analyzed: paṇidhāya ati arahā ati mama jānantu uti cittam ṭhapetvā patthetvā vā āpāthaka jjhāyī ti manussānam āpātha ṭṭhāne samādhim samāpannaḥ viya nisīdantaḥ āpāthake janassa pākaṭa ṭṭhāne jhāyī

original: Aññaṃ viya katvā attano samīpe bhaṇanaṃ sāmantajappitaṃ. Ākārassa rassattaṃ katvā
analyzed: aññam viya katvā attano samīpe bhaṇanam sāmanta jappitam ākārassa rassattam katvā

original: “aṭhapanā”ti vuttaṃ. Kuhanaṃ kuho, tassa ayanā pavatti kuhāyanā, kuhassa vā puggalassa
analyzed: aṭhapanā iti vuttam kuhanam kuhaḥ tassa ayanā pavatti kuhāyanā kuhassa vā puggalassa

original: ayanā gatikiriyā kuhāyanā.
analyzed: ayanā gati kiriyā kuhāyanā

original: 862. Puṭṭhassāti “ko tisso, ko rājapūjito”ti puṭṭhassa. Nahanāti bandhanā pariveṭhanā.
analyzed: puṭṭhassa ati kaḥ tisso kaḥ rāja pūjito ti puṭṭhassa nahanā ati bandhanā pariveṭhanā

original: 863. Nimittena caranto jīvanto nimittakārako nemittiko, tassa bhāvo nemittikatā.
analyzed: nimittena carantaḥ jīvantaḥ nimitta kārako nemittikaḥ tassa bhāvaḥ nemittika tā

original: Attano icchāya pakāsanaṃ obhāso. Ko pana soti? “Ajja bhikkhūnaṃ paccayā dullabhā
analyzed: attanaḥ icchāya pakāsanam obhāsaḥ kaḥ pana so ti ajja bhikkhūnam paccayā dullabhā

original: jātā”tiādikā paccayapaṭisaṃyuttakathā. Icchitavatthussa samīpe kathanaṃ sāmantajappā.
analyzed: jāta ati ādikā paccaya paṭisaṃyutta kathā icchita vatthussa samīpe kathanam sāmantajappā

original: 864. Bahi chaḍḍanaṃ ukkhepanā. Parapiṭṭhimaṃsakhādanasīlo parapiṭṭhimaṃsiko, tassa bhāvo parapiṭṭhimaṃsikatā.
analyzed: bahi chaḍḍanam ukkhepanā para piṭṭhi maṃsa khādana sīlo para piṭṭhi maṃsikaḥ tassa bhāvaḥ para piṭṭhi maṃsika tā

original: 865. Nikattuṃ appena lābhena bahukaṃ vañcetvā gahetuṃ icchanaṃ nijigīsanaṃ, tassa bhāvo nijigīsanatā. Tasseva icchanassa pavattiākāro, taṃsahajātaṃ vā gavesanakammaṃ.
analyzed: nikattum appena lābhena bahukam vañcetvā gahetum icchanam nijigīsanam tassa bhāvaḥ nijigīsana tā tassa iva icchanassa pavatti ākāraḥ tad sahajātam vā gavesana kammaṃ

original: 866. Vaṇṇasampannaṃ pokkharaṃ vaṇṇapokkharanti uttarapadalopo pubbapadassa daṭṭhabbo,
analyzed: vaṇṇa sampannam pokkharam vaṇṇa pokkharanti uttara pada lopaḥ pubba padassa daṭṭhabbo

original: vaṇṇapāripūrī vā vaṇṇapokkharatā. “Atthajāpikā”ti ettha viya japa-saddo uppattivācakoti āha “pavattetī”ti.
analyzed: vaṇṇa pāripūrī vā vaṇṇa pokkhara tā attha jāpikā ti ettha viya japa saddo uppatti vācakaḥ ti āha pavatteti iti

original: 867. Seyyasadisamānā unnativasena pavattāti ubhayatthāpi “mānaṃ jappetī”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: seyya sadisa mānā unnati vasena pavattā ati ubhayattha api mānam jappeti iti vuttam

original: 868. Hīnamāno pana onativasena pavattito kevalena mānasaddena niddesaṃ nārahatīti taṃniddese “omānaṃ jappetī”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: hīna mānaḥ pana onati vasena pavattitaḥ kevalena māna saddena niddesam na ārahati iti tad niddese omānam jappeti iti vuttam

original: 872. Rājabhogena raṭṭhabhuñjanako rājanissito raṭṭhiyo.
analyzed: rāja bhogena raṭṭha bhuñjanakaḥ rāja nissitaḥ raṭṭhiyaḥ

original: 879. Puggalaṃ anāmasitvāti yathā seyyassa seyyamānādiniddesesu “parehi seyyaṃ attānaṃ
analyzed: puggalam an āmasitvā ti yathā seyyassa seyyamāna ādi niddesesu parehi seyyam attānam

original: dahatī”ti seyyādipuggalo mānuppādako āmaṭṭho, evametassa seyyamānabhāvepi mānuppādakapuggalavisesaṃ
analyzed: dahati iti seyya ādi puggalaḥ māna uppādakaḥ āmaṭṭhaḥ evam etassa seyyamāna bhāve pi māna uppādaka puggala visesam

original: anāmasitvā “pare atimaññati”cceva vuttanti attho. Pare atikkamitvā maññanañhi yassa kassaci atimānoti.
analyzed: an āmasitvā pare vuttanti attho pare atikkamitvā yassa kassaci

original: 880. Purimamānassa uparimāno mānātimāno, ati-saddo upari-saddassa atthaṃ vadatīti daṭṭhabbo. Purimamānaṃ vā atikkanto māno mānātimāno.
analyzed: purima mānassa upari mānaḥ māna atimānaḥ atisaddaḥ upari saddassa attham vadati iti daṭṭhabbo purima mānam vā atikkantaḥ mānaḥ māna atimānaḥ

original: 881. Pakkhijātīsu vāyaso anto lāmakoti katvā “kākajāti viyā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: pakkhi jātīsu vāyasaḥ antar lāmakaḥ ti katvā kāka jāti viya iti vuttam

original: 882. Thero kira dosacarito ahosi, tasmā āditova “tumhe akhīṇāsavā”ti avatvā upāyena kathesīti vadanti, dosacaritattā vā khippaṃ tatiyapadavāre virāgaṃ uppādesīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: thero kira dosa caritaḥ ahosi tasmai āditas va tumhe akhīṇa āsavā ti avatvā upāyena kathesi iti vadanti dosa carita ttā vā khippam tatiya padavāre virāgam uppādesi iti adhippāyaḥ

original: 883. Mānaṃ anugatacchandoti mānasampayuttachando, mānasabhāvaṃ anugato mānacchando vā.
analyzed: mānam anugata chandaḥ iti māna sampayutta chandaḥ mānasa bhāvam anugataḥ māna chandaḥ vā

original: 884. “Vilambana”nti ca itthipurisasammānanādikiriyādivilambanapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kattabbaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tattha yuttamuttasiliṭṭhaṃ paṭibhānaṃ vilambanapaṭibhānaṃ.
analyzed: vilambanam ti ca itthi purisa sammānana ādi kiriyā ādi vilambana paṭisaṃyuttam kattabbam daṭṭhabbam tattha yuttam utta siliṭṭham paṭibhānam vilambana paṭibhānam

original: 887. Amaravādapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko, attano amaraṇatthāya devabhāvatthāya vā vitakko amaravitakko.
analyzed: amara vāda paṭisaṃyuttaḥ vitakkaḥ attanaḥ amaraṇa tthāya deva bhāva tthāya vā vitakkaḥ amaravitakko

original: 888. Paresu anuddayā rāgavasena anuddayakaraṇaṃ etassāti parānuddayo, tassa bhāvo
analyzed: paresu anuddayā rāga vasena anuddaya karaṇam etassa ati para anuddayaḥ tassa bhāvo

original: parānuddayatā, paresu vā anuddayasseva sahananditādikassa bhāvo parānuddayatā, tādiso
analyzed: para anuddaya tā paresu vā anuddayassa iva saha nandita ādikassa bhāvaḥ para anuddaya tā tādisaḥ

original: rāgo. Tatthāti parānuddayatāya saṃsaṭṭhavihārena dassitāyāti attho yujjati.
analyzed: rāgaḥ tattha ati para anuddaya tāya saṃsaṭṭha vihārena dassitāya ati atthaḥ yujjati

original: 890. Anavaññattiṃ patthento anavaññattatthameva kāmaguṇe ca patthetīti āha “pañcakāma…pe… nissito hutvā”ti.
analyzed: anavaññattim patthentaḥ anavaññatta ttham eva kāma guṇe ca pattheti iti āha pañca kāmape nissitaḥ hutvā iti

original: Ekakaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: ekaka niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: (2.) Dukaniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: duka niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 891. Upanayhatīti bandhati. A-kāro anantaratthavācako, mariyādavācakassa vā ākārassa
analyzed: upanayhati iti bandhati akāraḥ anantarattha vācakaḥ mariyāda vācakassa vā ākārassa

original: rassattaṃ katvā “aṭṭhapanā”ti vuttanti “anantaraṭṭhapanā”tiādimāha. Tattha paṭhamuppannassa
analyzed: katvā aṭṭhapanā iti vuttanti anantaraṭṭhapanā iti ādim āha tattha paṭhama uppannassa

original: pavattākāro mariyādā, taṃ anatikkamitvā tasseva daḷhīkaraṇavasena ṭhapanā mariyādaṭṭhapanā.
analyzed: pavatta ākāraḥ mariyādā tam an atikkamitvā tassa iva daḷhīkaraṇa vasena ṭhapanā mariyādaṭṭhapanā

original: Pakatiṭṭhapanāmattameva, visesanarahitāti attho.
analyzed: pakati ṭṭhapanā mattam eva visesana rahitā ti attho

original: 892. Niṭṭhuriyaṃ kheḷapātanaṃ, niṭṭhuriyaṃ viya niṭṭhuriyaṃ. Dassetvāti dantehi chinditvā.
analyzed: niṭṭhuriyam kheḷa pātanam niṭṭhuriyam viya niṭṭhuriyam dassetvā iti dantehi chinditvā

original: Tena pana dassanaṃ paḷāsoti dasseti. Paḷāsassa āyanāti yugaggāhappavatti. Samabhāvadahanaṃ
analyzed: tena pana dassanam paḷāsaḥ oti dasseti paḷāsassa yuga ggāha ppavatti sama bhāva dahanam

original: jayo, tassa āharaṇato āhāro. Dhuraṃ na detīti pāmokkhaṃ na deti.
analyzed: jayaḥ tassa āharaṇataḥ āhāraḥ dhuram na deti iti pāmokkham na deti

original: 894. Kāyena cetiyaṅgaṇādivattaṃ karoti “evaṃ vattasampanno saddho kathaṃ kāyaduccaritādīni
analyzed: kāyena cetiya ṅgaṇa ādi vattam karoti evam vatta sampannaḥ saddho katham kāya duccarita ādīni

original: karissatī”ti paresaṃ ñāpanatthaṃ. Aticcāti accayaṃ katvā. Āsarantīti āgacchanti,
analyzed: karissati iti paresam ñāpana attham aticca ati accayam katvā āsaranti iti āgacchanti

original: puna paṭicchādane pavattantīti attho. Konāmevaṃ karotīti vocchindanacchādanā vā vocchādanā.
analyzed: puna paṭicchādane pavattanti iti vocchindana chādanā vā vocchādanā

original: Na sammā bhāsitāti yo na sammā bhāsati, so saṭhoti dasseti. Kucchi vā piṭṭhi vā jānituṃ
analyzed: na sammā bhāsitā ati yaḥ na sammā bhāsati so saṭho ti dasseti kucchi vā piṭṭhi vā jānituṃ

original: na sakkāti asantaguṇasambhāvaneneva cittānurūpakiriyāvirahato “evaṃcitto evaṃkiriyo”ti
analyzed: na sakkā ati asanta guṇa sambhāvanena iva citta anurūpa kiriyā virahataḥ evam cittaḥ evaṃkiriyaḥ iti

original: jānituṃ na sakkāti attho.
analyzed: jānitum na sakkā iti atthaḥ

original: Ajo eva ajāmigo. Nelakoti taruṇavaccho. Yathā so yakkho tādisaṃ rūpaṃ dassetvā “ajā”ti
analyzed: ajaḥ eva ajāmigaḥ na ilakoti taruṇa vacchaḥ yathā saḥ yakkhaḥ tādisam rūpam dassetvā ajāti

original: saññāya āgatāgate khādati, evamayampi taṃtaṃsadisaguṇasambhāvanena te te vañceti.
analyzed: saññāyaḥ āgata āgate khādati evam ayam pi taṃ taṃsa disa guṇa sambhāvanena te te vañca iti

original: Tenetaṃ sāṭheyyaṃ māyāto balavatarā vañcanāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Teneva “parikkhattatā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: tena itam sāṭheyyam māyātaḥ balavatarā vañcanā ti daṭṭhabbam tena iva parikkhatta tā ti vuttam

original: 908. Sakkāyadiṭṭhādīnaṃ abhāvepi yaṃ saṃyojanaṃ hoti, taṃ bahiddhā saṃyojanato bahiddhāsaṃyojanassa puggalassa visesanabhūtaṃ bahiddhāsaṃyojanaṃ nāma.
analyzed: sakkāya diṭṭha ādīnam abhāve pi yam saṃyojanam hoti tam bahiddhā saṃyojanataḥ bahiddhā saṃyojanassa puggalassa visesana bhūtam bahiddhāsaṃyojanam nāma

original: Dukaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: duka niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: (3.) Tikaniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: tika niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 909. Akusalamūlāneva vaṭṭamūlānīti tehi kathitehi vaṭṭamūlasamudācāro kathito hotīti āha “tīhi…pe… kathito”ti.
analyzed: akusala mūlāni eva vaṭṭa mūlāni iti tehi kathitehi vaṭṭa mūla samudācāraḥ kathitaḥ hoti iti āha tīhipe kathitaḥ iti

original: 919. Sassato lokotiādidassanameva brahmacariyaṃ mokkhasampāpakaṃ uttamacariyanti
analyzed: sassataḥ loka uti ādi dassanam eva brahmacariyam mokkha sampāpakam uttama cariyan ti

original: diṭṭhigatikehi sammatanti āha “diṭṭhigatikasammatassā”ti. Rūpārūpāvacaravipākesu
analyzed: diṭṭhi gatikehi sammatanti āha diṭṭhi gatika sammatassa ati rūpa arūpa avacara vipākesu

original: sātisayo bhavarāgoti adhippāyena vuttaṃ “mahābrahmāna”nti.
analyzed: sa atisayaḥ bhava rāgaḥ ti adhippāyena vuttam mahābrahmānanti

original: 920. Kathaṃvidhanti kenākārena saṇṭhitanti atthoti katvā āha “ākārasaṇṭhāna”nti. Mānaṭhapanāti seyyādivasena mānena ṭhapanā, mānasaṅkhātā vā ṭhapanā.
analyzed: kathaṃvidhanti kena ākārena saṇṭhitanti attho ti katvā āha ākāra saṇṭhānanti māna ṭhapanā ati seyyā ādi vasena mānena ṭhapanā māna saṅkhātā vā ṭhapanā

original: 921. Cetaso utrāso domanassaṃ, doso vā, taṃsampayuttā vā cetanādayo.
analyzed: cetasaḥ domanassam dosaḥ vā tad sampayuttāḥ vā cetanā ādayaḥ

original: 922. Desanāsukhatāyāti tiṇṇaṃ addhānaṃ vasena vicikicchāya desanā sukhā “kaṅkhati
analyzed: desanā sukhatāya ati tiṇṇam addhānam vasena vicikicchāya desanā sukhā kaṅkhati

original: vicikicchatī”ti, na pana tathā mohenāti adhippāyo. Vaṇṇādibhedaṃ sutvāti keci kira
analyzed: vicikicchati iti na pana tathā mohena ati adhippāyaḥ vaṇṇa ādi bhedam sutvā iti keci kira

original: vadanti “khattiyajīvo paṇḍuvaṇṇo. Kasmā? So hi pubbaṇhe ramati, pubbaṇhe ca chāyā
analyzed: vadanti khattiya jīvaḥ paṇḍu vaṇṇaḥ kasmā saḥ hi pubbaṇhe ramati pubbaṇhe ca chāyā

original: paṇḍuvaṇṇā. Brāhmaṇavessasuddajīvā odātapītakāḷavaṇṇā. Te hi majjhanhasāyanharattīsu
analyzed: paṇḍu vaṇṇāḥ brāhmaṇa vessa suddajīvāḥ odāta pīta kāḷa vaṇṇā te hi majjhan ha sāyan harattīsu

original: odātapītakāḷachāyā kāḷatamakālesu ramantī”ti tesaṃ vaṇṇabhedaṃ, “byāpī parimaṇḍalo”tiādinā
analyzed: ramanti iti tesam vaṇṇa bhedam byāpī parimaṇḍala uti ādinā

original: kathentānaṃ saṇṭhānabhedañca sutvā.
analyzed: kathentānam saṇṭhāna bhedam ca sutvā

original: 923. Purisapuggaloti padadvayaṃ ekapadaṃ katvā jānantānaṃ vasenāyaṃ sammutikathā
analyzed: purisa puggalaḥ ti pada dvayam eka padam katvā jānantānam vasena ayam sammuti kathā

original: pavattā, padantarameva vā idaṃ puggalavācakanti dassento “ayaṃ panā”tiādimāha. Atha
analyzed: pavattā pada antaram eva vā idam puggala vācakanti dassentaḥ ayam pana ati ādim āha atha

original: vā purisoti vutto ca puggalo eva, na purisindriyayuttovāti dassanatthampi “purisapuggalo”ti
analyzed: vā purisaḥ ti vutto ca puggalaḥ eva na purisa indriya yuttaḥ vā ati dassana ttham pi purisa puggalaḥ ti

original: vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Aṭṭhasu ābādhesūti pittasemhavātasamuṭṭhānautuvipariṇāmajaopakkamikavisamaparihārajasannipātajakammasamuṭṭhānesu.
analyzed: vuttanti veditabbam aṭṭhasu ābādhesu ti pitta semha vāta samuṭṭhāna otu vipariṇāma ja opakkamika visama parihāra ja sannipāta ja kamma samuṭṭhānesu

original: Pubbe katanti purāṇatarakammaṃ icchantīti upapajjavedanīyañca kira paṭikkhipanti.
analyzed: pubbe katanti purāṇatara kammam icchanti iti upapajja vedanīyam ca kira paṭikkhipanti

original: Āṇattimūlakena vāti yopi āṇāpetvā vadhabandhādidukkhaṃ uppādeti, tampi taṃmūlakaṃ
analyzed: āṇatti mūlakena vāti yaḥ api āṇāpetvā vadha bandha ādi dukkham uppādeti tam pi taṃmūlakam

original: na hoti, issaranimmānamūlamevāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: na hoti issara nimmāna mūlam eva ati adhippāyaḥ

analyzed: na pana itara iti ādim āha tat dīpana attham eva āti asamāna kāla tā dīpana attham eva na sahuppāda dīpana attham

original: Addhānaparicchedakathā hi ayanti.
analyzed: hi ayanti

original: Yadi evanti yathā phalapattāni, evaṃ rūpārūpadhammā yadi dandhalahuparivattino. Asamānaddhattāti
analyzed: yadi evanti yathā phala pattāni evam rūpa arūpa dhammāḥ yadi dandha lahu parivattinaḥ

original: atulyakālattā. Nicchiddesūti nibbivaresu. Tena nirantarappavattiṃ eva vibhāveti.
analyzed: atulya kāla ttā nicchiddesu iti nibbivaresu tena nirantara ppavattim eva vibhāveti

original: Ayanti addhānaparicchedakathā. Cittajarūpādīnaṃ na tathā nirantarabhāvena pavatti,
analyzed: citta ja rūpa ādīnam na tathā nirantara bhāvena

original: yathā kammajarūpānanti āha “kammajarūpappavattiṃ sandhāyā”ti. Kammajarūpānaṃ vā itaresaṃ

original: mūlabhāvato padhānanti “kammajarūpappavattiṃ sandhāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Acittuppādakattā
analyzed: mūla bhāvataḥ padhānan ti kamma ja rūpa ppavattim sandhāya iti vuttam acittuppādaka ttā

original: abyābajjhatāya nirodhasamāpattiyā nibbānapaṭibhāgatā veditabbā. Pade padaṃ akkamitvāti

original: lakuṇḍakapādatāya attano akkantapadasamīpe padaṃ nikkhipitvā. Yo hi sīghapadavikkamo

original: rūpaṃ kammajamidhādhippetanti katvā vuttaṃ. Utujaṃ pana cutito uddhampi pavattati

original: vuttaṃ addhānappakāraṃ.
analyzed: vuttam addhānappakāram

original: Ekuppādatoti samānuppādato. Samānattho hi ayaṃ eka-saddo. Eko daṭṭhabbākāroti eko

analyzed: vadati sabbam pi itiādinā tattha atippasaṅgam dasseti vajjetabbam na anuppādam eka nirodham

original: Gahetabbaṃ ekuppādanānānirodhaṃ. Ubhayampi tadā natthi anuppajjanato. Tenevāha “kammajarūpassa
analyzed: gahetabbam eka uppāda nānā nirodham ubhayam pi tadā natthi anuppajjanato tena iva āha kamma ja rūpassa

original: anuppattito”ti. Tato pubbeti pacchimakammajarūpuppajjanato oraṃ. Aññassāti yassa
analyzed: anuppattito ti tatas pubbā iti pacchima kamma ja rūpa uppajjanato aññassa iti yassa

original: cittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ, tato aññassa cittassa. Ṭhitikkhaṇe uppannassa ekuppādatā,
analyzed: cittassa uppāda kkhaṇe uppannam tatas aññassa cittassa ṭhiti kkhaṇe uppannassa ekuppāda tā

analyzed: bhaṅga kkhaṇe uppannassa nānā nirodha tā ca natthi iti āha ṭhiti bhaṅga kkhaṇesu uppanna rūpāni

original: vajjetvā”ti. Tenāti rūpena. “Saṅkhalikassa viya sambandho”ti etena avicchinnasambandho

analyzed: idha paveṇī iti adhippeto ti dasseti aññathā ati vicchijjamānam pi gahetvā paveṇī iti

original: Sudīpanattāti sukhadīpanattā, nayadassanabhāvena vā suṭṭhu dīpanattā. Tenevāha “etena
analyzed: su dīpana ttā ati sukha dīpana ttā naya dassana bhāvena vā suṭṭhu dīpana ttā tena iva āha etena

original: hi nayenā”tiādi. Tattha tanti rūpaṃ. Tenāti rūpena. Ubhayatthāti pacchimakammajarūpappavattiyaṃ,

original: Tassāti rūpassa. Ettha ca pacchimakammajarūpappavattiyaṃ nirujjhanakanti vuttaṃ tato
analyzed: tassa iti rūpassa ettha ca pacchima kamma ja rūpa ppavattiyam nirujjhanakanti vuttam tatas

analyzed: nipphannassa ti adhippāyaḥ tena āha aṭṭhakathā ayam yaḥ ca ayam kamma ādi samuṭṭhānassa api

analyzed: aṭṭhakathā padeso ti etehi natthi yeva eka uppāda eka nirodha dīpanato ti adhippāyo tena

analyzed: pavattanti iti tad attha nipphatti samanantaram eva nirujjhanataḥ lahu parivattinaḥ tena āha

original: ca avivādahetukaṃ sutte vibhāvitaṃ dassento “tassa panā”tiādimāha.

original: Maraṇaniddesavaṇṇanā
193. Khandhabhedassāti khandhavināsassa. Soti khandhabhedo. Pabandhasamucchedoti

original: atthīti āha “na vipākuppādanena kusalatā vipākadhammatā cā”ti. Kevalañhi yā aññesaṃ

original: pavattīti vipākadhammatā, anavajjaṭṭhena kusalatā ca vuttā. Evampi yadi vipākadhammā

original: abhiññācetanā, kathaṃ avipākāti? Asambhavatoti taṃ asambhavaṃ dassetuṃ “sā panā”tiādi

analyzed: rūpāvacara vipākassa paritta ādi ārammaṇam ca na ayam asambhavaḥ tena āha attanā

analyzed: ca ati sabbathā api tattha vijjamānānam gandha rasānam āyatanesu avacane kāraṇam na atthi iti

original: dassento “dhammabhāvo cā”tiādimāha. Aññassa paramatthassa abhāvā. Koci āyatanasabhāvoti
analyzed: dassentaḥ dhamma bhāvaḥ ca ati ādim āha aññassa paramatthassa abhāvā koci āyatana sabhāvo ti

original: dhammāyatanameva sandhāya vadati. Tena yadi rūpabhave gandharasā vijjanti, yathāvuttakāraṇato
analyzed: dhamma āyatanam eva sandhāya vadati tena yadi rūpa bhave gandha rasāḥ vijjanti yathā vutta kāraṇataḥ

original: gandharasāyatanabhāvena avuccamānāpi dhammāyatanabhāvena vattabbā siyuṃ, na ca vuttā.
analyzed: gandha rasa āyatana bhāvena a vuccamānā api dhamma āyatana bhāvena vattabbā siyum na ca vuttā

original: Tasmā niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ “nattheva rūpabhave gandharasā”ti dasseti. Kiñca rūpadhātuyaṃ
analyzed: tasmā niṭṭham ettha gantabbam nattha iva rūpa bhave gandha rasā ati dasseti kiñca

original: gandharasabhāvena avuttānaṃ, kāmadhātuyaṃ vuttānaṃ tesaṃ kiṃ gandharasabhāvato aññena
analyzed: gandha rasa bhāvena a vuttānam kāmadhātuyam vuttānam tesam kim gandha rasa bhāvato aññena

original: sabhāvena rūpadhātuyaṃ atthibhāvo, udāhu gandharasabhāvena. Yadi purimo pakkho dhammāyatane
analyzed: sa bhāvena rūpa dhātuyam atthi bhāvaḥ udāhu gandha rasa bhāvena yadi purimaḥ pakkhaḥ dhamma āyatane

original: tesaṃ saṅgaho siyā anāyatanasabhāvassa sabhāvadhammassa abhāvā, atha dutiyo teneva
analyzed: tesam saṅgahaḥ siyā anāyatana sabhāvassa sabhāva dhammassa abhāvā atha dutiyaḥ tena iva

original: kāraṇena nesaṃ gandharasāyatanabhāvo siddhoti imamatthaṃ dassento “yadi cā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: kāraṇena na īsam gandha rasa āyatana bhāvo siddho ti imam attham dassentaḥ yadi ca ati ādim āha

original: Tasmāti yasmā gandharasā dhammahadayavibhaṅge na vuttā, kathāvatthumhi ca tesaṃ bhāvo
analyzed: tasmā iti yasmā gandha rasāḥ dhamma hadaya vibhaṅge na vuttā kathā vatthumhi ca tesam bhāvaḥ

original: paṭikkhitto, phusituṃ asakkuṇeyyā pathavīādayo viya ghāyituṃ sāyituñca asakkuṇeyyā
analyzed: paṭikkhittaḥ phusitum a sakkuṇeyyā pathavī ādayaḥ viya ghāyitum sāyitum ca a sakkuṇeyyā

original: te natthi, dhātusaddena ca te gahitā, dhammabhāvo ca tesaṃ ekantiko, tasmiñca sati
analyzed: te natthi dhātu saddena ca te gahitāḥ dhamma bhāvo ca tesam ekantikaḥ tasmin ca sati

original: siddho āyatanabhāvo, tasmā. Tathāti pāḷiyaṃ avuttadhamme hāpetvā cakkhusattakādivasena.
analyzed: siddhaḥ āyatana bhāvaḥ tasmā tathā ati pāḷiyam a vutta dhamme hāpetvā cakkhu sattaka ādi vasena

original: Evanti cakkhusattakādivasena rūpagaṇanāya kariyamānāya. Dhammatāti pāḷidhammo, rūpabhave
analyzed: evam ti cakkhu sattaka ādi vasena rūpa gaṇanāya kariyamānāya dhamma tā ati pāḷi dhammaḥ rūpa bhave

original: vā pavattanakarūpadhammatā. “Na vilomitā”ti iminā yathāpaṭiññātaṃ dhammaṃ dīpitaṃ ulliṅgeti.
analyzed: vā pavattanaka rūpa dhamma tā na vilomitā ati iminā yathā paṭiññātam dhammam dīpitam ulliṅgeti

original: Ettha ca rūpāvacarasattānaṃ ghānajivhāyatanābhāvato vijjamānāpi gandharasā āyatanakiccaṃ
analyzed: ettha ca rūpāvacara sattānam ghāna jivhā āyatana abhāvataḥ vijjamānā api gandha rasāḥ āyatana kiccam

original: na karontīti te anāmasitvā pāḷiyaṃ “pañcāyatanāni pātubhavanti, cha āyatanānī”tiādi
analyzed: na karonti iti te an āmasitvā pāḷiyam pañca āyatanāni pātubhavanti cha āyatanāni itiādi

original: vuttaṃ. “Tayo āhārā”ti ca ajjhoharitabbassa āhārassa abhāvena ojaṭṭhamakarūpasamuṭṭhāpanasaṅkhātassa
analyzed: vuttam tayo āhārā ti ca ajjhoharitabbassa āhārassa abhāvena oja ṭṭhamaka rūpa samuṭṭhāpana saṅkhātassa

original: āhārakiccassa akaraṇato, na sabbena sabbaṃ gandharasānaṃ ojāya ca abhāvato. Iti visayino
analyzed: āhāra kiccassa akaraṇataḥ na sabbena sabbam gandha rasānaṃ ojāya ca abhāvataḥ iti visayinaḥ

original: kiccassa ca abhāvena visayo, kiccavā ca dhammo na vutto. Yasmiñhi bhave visayī natthi,
analyzed: kiccassa ca abhāvena visayaḥ kiccavā ca dhammo na vuttaḥ yasmin hi bhave visayī natthi

original: tasmiṃ taṃhetuko nippariyāyena visayassa āyatanabhāvo natthīti vijjamānassāpi avacanaṃ,
analyzed: tasmin taṃhetukaḥ nippariyāyena visayassa āyatana bhāvaḥ natthi iti vijjamānassa api avacanam

original: yathā rūpabhave pathavītejovāyodhātūnaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanabhāvena. Yassa pana yattha
analyzed: yathā rūpa bhave pathavī tejaḥ vāyo dhātūnam phoṭṭhabba āyatana bhāvena yassa pana

original: vacanaṃ, tassa tattha visayīsabbhāvahetuko nippariyāyena āyatanabhāvo vutto diṭṭho
analyzed: vacanam tassa tattha visayī sabbhāva hetukaḥ nippariyāyena āyatana bhāvaḥ vuttaḥ diṭṭhaḥ

original: yathā tattheva rūpāyatanassa. Yadi visayīsabbhāvahetuko visayassa nippariyāyena āyatanabhāvo,

original: kathaṃ asaññasattānaṃ devānaṃ dve āyatanāni pātubhavantīti. Asaññasattānañhi cakkhāyatanaṃ
analyzed: katham asaññasattānam devānam dve āyatanāni pātubhavanti iti asaññasattānam hi cakkhāyatanam

original: natthi, acakkhāyatanabhāvena ca nesaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ aññesaṃ avisayoti? Nāyaṃ virodho.
analyzed: natthi a cakkhu āyatana bhāvena ca nesam rūpa āyatanam aññesam avisayaḥ ti na ayam virodho

original: Yena adhippāyena rūpadhātuyaṃ saññīnaṃ gandhāyatanādīnaṃ avacanaṃ, tena rūpāyatanassāpi
analyzed: yena adhippāyena rūpa dhātuyam saññīnam gandha āyatana ādīnam avacanam tena rūpa āyatanassa api

original: avacananti asaññīnaṃ ekaṃ āyatanaṃ vattabbaṃ. Yathāsakañhi indriyagocarabhāvāpekkhāya
analyzed: avacananti asaññīnam ekam āyatanam vattabbam yathā sakan hi indriya gocara bhāva apekkhāya

original: yesaṃ nippariyāyena āyatanabhāvo atthi, tesu niddisiyamānesu tadabhāvato rūpadhātuyaṃ
analyzed: yesam nippariyāyena āyatana bhāvaḥ atthi tesu niddisiyamānesu tad abhāvataḥ

original: saññīnaṃ gandhādike visuṃ āyatanabhāvena avatvā dhammasabhāvānativattanato, manoviññāṇassa
analyzed: saññīnam gandha ādike visum āyatana bhāvena avatvā dhamma sabhāva anativattanataḥ manaḥ viññāṇassa

original: ca visayabhāvūpagamanato dhammāyatanantogadhe katvā “pañcāyatanānī”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: ca visaya bhāva upagamanataḥ katvā pañcāyatanāni iti pāḷiyam vuttam

original: Etadatthañhi “dhammāyatana”nti sāmaññato nāmakaraṇaṃ, piṭṭhivaṭṭakāni vā tāni katvā
analyzed: etad attham hi dhamma āyatanan ti sāmaññataḥ nāmakaraṇam piṭṭhivaṭṭakāni vā tāni katvā

original: “pañcāyatanānī”ti vuttaṃ. Yena ca pana adhippāyena asaññīnaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ vuttaṃ,
analyzed: pañca āyatanāni iti vuttam yena ca pana adhippāyena asaññīnam rūpa āyatanam vuttam

original: tena saññīnampi gandhādīnaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ kātabbanti imassa nayassa dassanatthaṃ
analyzed: tena saññīnam pi gandha ādīnam visum gahaṇam kātabbanti imassa nayassa dassana attham

original: “asaññasattānaṃ devānaṃ dve āyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti vuttaṃ. Asatipi hi attano indriye

original: rūpassa vaṇṇāyatanasabhāvātikkamo natthevāti taṃ rūpāyatanantveva vuccati. Iminā
analyzed: rūpassa vaṇṇa āyatana sabhāva atikkamaḥ nattha iva ati tam rūpāyatanam tu eva vuccati iminā

original: ca nayadassanena gandhādīni tīṇi pakkhipitvā saññīnaṃ aṭṭha āyatanāni, asaññīnaṃ

original: pañcāti ayamattho dassito hoti. Evañcetaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ. Aññathā rūpaloke phusitumasakkuṇeyyatāya
analyzed: pañca iti ayam attho dassito hoti evañca itam sampaṭicchitabbam aññathā rūpa loke phusitum a sakkuṇeyya tāya

analyzed: pathavī ādīnam vacī ghosaḥ eva na siyā na hi paṭighaṭṭana a nighaṃsam antarena sadda ppavatti

original: atthi, na ca phusanasabhāvānaṃ katthaci aphusanasabhāvatā sakkā viññātuṃ. Phoṭṭhabbāyatanasaṅkhātassa

original: vutto. Evañca katvā rūpadhātuyaṃ tesaṃ sappaṭighavacanañca samatthitaṃ hoti. Vuttañhi
analyzed: vuttaḥ evam ca katvā rūpadhātuyam tesam sa paṭigha vacanam ca samatthitam hoti vuttam hi

analyzed: asaññasattānam anidassana sappaṭigham ekam mahābhūtam paṭicca dve mahābhūta atiādi

original: Paṭigho hettha bhūtattayassa kāyappasādaṃ pati taṃnissayabhūtaghaṭṭanadvārena abhimukhabhāvo,
analyzed: paṭighaḥ ha ittha bhūta ttayassa kāya ppasādam pati tad nissaya bhūta ghaṭṭana dvārena abhimukha bhāvaḥ

analyzed: pana itaresam abhāvataḥ na api pariyāyena gandha āyatana ādīnam āyatana sabhāva abhāvataḥ

original: Asaññīnañhi rūpāyatanaṃ samānabhūmikānaṃ vehapphalānaṃ, uparibhūmikānañca suddhavāsānaṃ
analyzed: asaññīnam hi rūpa āyatanam samāna bhūmikānam vehapphalānam upari bhūmikānam ca suddha vāsānam

analyzed: pasādassa visaya bhāvam gacchati na pana gandha rasā ti tesam yeva tatthāvacanam yuttam

analyzed: kathā vatthumhi ca nippariyāyena gandha āyatana ādīnam atthi bhāvam paṭijānantam sandhāya

analyzed: paṭisedho kataḥ yadi pi vacanam na

original: hoti, atthibhāvadīpanampi pana aññavacanaṃ natthevāti? Nayidamevaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu tattha
analyzed: hoti atthi bhāva dīpanam pi pana aññavacanam nattha iva ati nayidam evam aṭṭhakathāsu tattha

analyzed: na isam atthi bhāvassa niddhāretvā vutta ttā yat hi aṭṭhakathā vacanam pāḷiyā na virujjhati

original: taṃ pāḷi viya pamāṇabhūtaṃ agarahitāya ācariyaparamparāya yāvajjatanā āgatattā. Tattha
analyzed: tam pamāṇa bhūtam aga rahitāya ācariya paramparāya yāvajjatanā tattha

original: siyā – yaṃ pāḷiyā na virujjhati aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ, taṃ pamāṇaṃ. Idaṃ pana virujjhatīti?

original: Nayidamevaṃ yathā na virujjhati, tathā paṭipāditattā. Cakkhādīnaṃ āyatanānaṃ, tannissayānañca
analyzed: na yidam evam yathā na virujjhati tathā paṭipādita ttā cakkha ādīnam āyatanānam tad nissayānam ca

analyzed: viññāṇānam satta suñña tā sandassana ttham bhagavataḥ dhātu desanā ati āyatana bhāvena vuttānam yeva

analyzed: dhātu bhāva dīpanataḥ avacanam yujjati eva tasmai yathā pāḷiyā

analyzed: avirodhaḥ hoti tathā cakkhu dasaka ādi vasena aṭṭhakathā ayam rūpa gaṇanā katā ati na ettha

original: dhammatāvilomanāsaṅkāya okāsoti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: dhamma tā vilomana saṅkāya okāso ti veditabbam

original: Eḷakassa jātakāle uṇṇā jātiuṇṇāti paṭhamo attho. Tato sukhumatarataṃ sandhāya “gabbhaṃ…pe… itipi vadantī”ti vuttaṃ. Sambhavanassa bhedo vā sambhavabhedo, pavattibhedoti attho.
analyzed: eḷakassa jāta kāle uṇṇā jāti uṇṇā ti paṭhamaḥ attho tatas sukhumataratam sandhāya vadanti iti vuttam sambhavanassa bhedaḥ vā sambhava bhedo pavatti bhedo ti attho

original: Rūpībrahmesūti adhikaraṇe bhummaṃ, opapātikayonikesūti niddhāraṇeti dassento “opapātikayonikehi
analyzed: rūpī brahmesu iti adhikaraṇe bhummam opapātika yonikesu iti niddhāraṇā iti dassento opapātika yonikehi

original: rūpībrahme niddhāretī”ti āha. Tena “opapātikayonikesū”ti sāmaññato vuttarāsito “rūpībrahmesū”ti
analyzed: rūpī brahme āha tena opapātika yonikesu iti sāmaññataḥ rūpī brahmesu iti

original: visesaṃ niddhāreti. Na sametīti na saṃsandati, virujjhatīti attho. Yāya pāḷiyā na
analyzed: visesam niddhāreti na sameti iti na saṃsandati virujjhati iti atthaḥ yāya pāḷiyā na

original: sameti, taṃ dassento “dhammahadayavibhaṅge hī”tiādimāha.
analyzed: samā iti tam dassentaḥ dhamma hadaya vibhaṅge hi itiādim āha

original: Ekādasāti paripuṇṇāyatanassa saddāyatanavajjāni ekādasāyatanāni. Kassaci dasāyatanānīti
analyzed: ekādasa ati paripuṇṇa āyatanassa sadda āyatana vajjāni ekādasa āyatanāni kassaci dasa āyatanāni iti

original: andhassa cakkhāyatanavajjāni. Kassaci aparāni dasāyatanānīti badhirassa sotāyatanavajjāni.
analyzed: andhassa cakkhāyatana vajjāni kassaci aparāni dasa āyatanāni iti badhirassa sotāyatana vajjāni

original: Kassaci navāyatanānīti andhabadhirassa cakkhusotāyatanavajjāni. Kassaci sattāyatanānīti
analyzed: kassaci nava āyatanāni iti andha badhirassa cakkhu sota āyatana vajjāni kassaci satta āyatanāni iti

original: gabbhaseyyakassa rūpagandharasakāyaphoṭṭhabbamanodhammāyatanavasena vuttaṃ.
analyzed: gabbhaseyyakassa rūpa gandha rasa kāya phoṭṭhabba manaḥ dhamma āyatana vasena vuttam

original: “Na vuttaṃ aṭṭhāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti idaṃ “na hi pāḷiyaṃ…pe… vuttā”ti etassa
analyzed: na vuttam aṭṭhāyatanāni pātubhavanti iti idam na hi etassa

original: atthavivaraṇaṃ. Cakkhusotaghānavikalassa hi upapajjamānassa aṭṭheva āyatanāni siyunti.
analyzed: attha vivaraṇam cakkhu sota ghāna vikalassa hi upapajjamānassa aṭṭha iva āyatanāni siyunti

original: Sati ca aghānakupapattiyaṃ punapi “kassaci aparāni dasāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti vattabbaṃ
analyzed: sati ca aghānaku papattiyam puna api kassaci aparāni dasa āyatanāni pātubhavanti iti vattabbam

original: siyā. Tathā ca sati yathā andhabadhirassa vasena “kassaci navāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti
analyzed: siyā tathā ca sati yathā andha badhirassa vasena kassaci nava āyatanāni pātubhavanti iti

original: ekavāraṃ vuttaṃ, evaṃ andhāghānakassa, badhirāghānakassa ca vasena “kassaci aparāni
analyzed: eka vāram vuttam evam andha āghānakassa badhira āghānakassa ca vasena kassaci aparāni

original: navāyatanāni, kassaci aparāni navāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti vattabbaṃ siyā, evaṃ na
analyzed: nava āyatanāni kassaci aparāni nava āyatanāni pātubhavanti iti vattabbam siyā evam na

original: vuttanti imamatthaṃ dasseti “tathā…pe… na ca taṃ vutta”nti. Evaṃ dhātupātubhāvādipañhesūti
analyzed: vuttanti imam attham dasseti na ca tam vuttanti evam dhātu pātubhāva ādi pañhesu iti

original: “kassaci ekādasa dhātuyo pātubhavanti, kassaci dasa dhātuyo, kassaci aparā dasa dhātuyo,

original: kasmā “itaraṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Avipākañhi tattha itaranti adhippetanti codanaṃ

original: sandhāyāha “paccayanaye panā”tiādi.

original: Paṭisandhiyaṃ arūpadhammā kammajarūpassa uppādakkhaṇe paccayā hontīti “pavatte”ti viseseti. “Pacchājātavippayuttādayo evā”ti niyamena sahajātapurejātavippayuttādayo nivatteti.
analyzed: paṭisandhiyam arūpa dhammā kamma ja rūpassa uppāda kkhaṇe paccayāḥ honti iti pavatteti viseseti pacchājāta vippayutta ādayaḥ eva ati niyamena sahajāta purejāta vippayutta ādayaḥ nivatteti

original: “Avasesamanāyatanassā”ti avasesaggahaṇampi pakaraṇato visiṭṭhavisayamevāti dassetuṃ

analyzed: sahajāta ādi sādhāraṇa paccaya bhāvo sampayutta vipāka hetu āhāra indriya ādi paccaya bhāvo sampayutta ādi asādhāraṇa paccaya bhāvo

analyzed: nāmassa rūpassa pana vippayutta paccaya bhāvaḥ yojetabbaḥ

original: Saḷāyatanapadaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Phassapadaniddesavaṇṇanā
230. Tadabhedavasenāti tassa phassassa abhedavasena, phassabhāvasāmaññenāti attho.
analyzed: tad abheda vasena āti tassa phassassa abheda vasena phassa bhāva sāmaññena ati attho

original: natthīti codanā “īdisī dhammatā natthī”ti ñāpanatthāti dasseti “aññassāpī”tiādinā.

original: Nidassanavasenāti udāharaṇadassanavasena. Ekaphassassa sambhavatoti kāraṇāpadeso.

analyzed: tad anta gadhā tassa ati upanissayassa

original: Bhavacakkakathāvaṇṇanā
242. Sambandhaṃ itaṃ gatanti samitaṃ. Tenāha “saṅgata”nti.

original: Bhavacchando bhavarāgo. Tassāruppakathāsavananti tassa bālabhāvassa ayuttakāritāya
analyzed: bhava chandaḥ bhava rāgaḥ tassa āruppa kathā savanan ti tassa bāla bhāvassa ayutta kāri tāya

analyzed: tena vuttam bodhenti iti

original: Visesanivattiattho mattasaddo “avitakkavicāramattā”tiādīsu viya. Appahīnāvijjā kāraṇalābhe

analyzed: jānāti iti vediyati iti pana kamma kattu kammānam vasena niddesaḥ ti tassa api attham dassento

original: attanā ca vedakena rahitanti attho. Ca-saddatthasamāsanti dvandasamāsamāha.

original: Catubbidhampi vā suññatanti dhuvabhāvādisuññataṃ, attādisuññatañca sandhāya vadati.

original: Pubbantatoti atītakoṭṭhāsato. Vedanāvasānampi bhavacakkaṃ paripuṇṇamevāti dassetuṃ

analyzed: vedanā vā ati ādi vuttam avijjā gahaṇena vā taṇhu pādānāni saṅkhāra ggahaṇena bhavaḥ

analyzed: viññāṇa ādi gahaṇena jāti jarā maraṇāni soka ādayo ca gahitā ati evam pi vedanā avasānam bhava cakkanti

original: Tenāha “dvinnaṃ…pe… hotī”ti. Tattha dvinnanti purimapacchimānaṃ ubhinnaṃ hetuphalavajjānaṃ.

original: Viparītābhinivesaṃ karontīti nimittaṃ kattuupacārena vadati. Anupacchedameva pakāsetīti yojanā.
analyzed: viparīta abhinivesam karonti iti nimittam kattu upacārena vadati an upacchedam eva pakāseti iti yojanā

original: Hetuphalasandhi, phalahetusandhi, punapi hetuphalasandhīti evaṃ hetuādipubbakā hetuphalahetupubbakā.

original: Hetuphalahetuphalavasenāti avijjādihetu, viññāṇādiphala, taṇhādihetu, jātiphalavasena.

original: Upasaggavisesena atthaviseso hotīti “ākirīyantī”ti padassa pakāsīyantīti attho vutto.

analyzed: dassetum tattha atiādi vuttam bhavassa ati upapatti bhavassa bhavaḥ ti vuttā cetanā sampayuttā ati

analyzed: sambandhaḥ gahaṇam ti nikāmana vasena ārammaṇassa gahaṇam tena āha kāma upādānam kiccena āha ati

original: Itarāni kiccenāhāti yojanā. Tīsu atthavikappesūti “taṃ kammaṃ karoto purimā cetanāyo”tiādinā
analyzed: itarāni kiccena āha ati yojanā tīsu attha vikappesu ti tam kammam purimā cetanāya iti ādinā

analyzed: vuttam tatiye attha vikappe vutte āyūhana saṅkhāre tad sampayuttā iti āha ati yojanā kammassa

original: Kammānevāti kammāniyeva. Vipākadhammatāya kammasarikkhakā. Sahajātakoṭiyā, upanissayakoṭiyā

original: Saccāniyeva pabhavoti samānādhikaraṇapakkhaṃ sandhāyāha “saccappabhavatoti saccato”ti. “Yassa pahānatthaṃ bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti evaṃbhūtaṃ ariyasaccaṃ visesaṃ akatvā.

original: Tehi sokādīhi. “Sokadomanassupāyāsā avijjāya aviyogino”tiādinā pubbe vuttanayena siddhāya avijjāya. Attanoyevāti paccayuppannaṃ anapekkhitvā attanoyeva pavattasaṅkhātakiccato.

original: Sokādayopi hīti ettha hi-saddo hetuattho. Yasmā “sokādayo paccayāyattā avasavattino”ti
analyzed: soka ādayaḥ api hi iti ettha hi saddaḥ hetu atthaḥ yasmā soka ādayaḥ paccaya āyattāḥ avasavattino ti

analyzed: idam sambhavanti iti etena vacanena siddham tasmā tam attā socati iti ādi dassana nivāraṇanti atthaḥ

analyzed: sati ca pariggahe rajjam viya gatiyaḥ aneka anattha anubandhanā tāhi ca viññāṇassa upadduta tā ti

original: Yathāupaṭṭhitāni kammādīni cutiāsannajavanehi parikappetvā viya gahitāni paṭisandhiviññāṇenapi

analyzed: toti saṅkappanam vā parikappananti vuttam vitakkena vitakkanato ti

original: Sasambhāracakkhuādayo saḷāyatanassa patiṭṭhāviseso.

analyzed: yad ākārāya jātiyā yad ākāram jarā maraṇam sambhavati sambhavantam ca yathānupubbam

original: veditabbo. Jātito jarāmaraṇaṃ na na hoti hotiyeva ekantena jātassa jarāmaraṇasambhavato,
analyzed: veditabbaḥ jātitaḥ jarā maraṇam na na hoti ekantena jātassa jarā maraṇa sambhavato

original: na ca jātiṃ vinā hoti ajātassa tadabhāvatoti jarāmaraṇassa jātipaccayataṃ anvayabyatirekehi
analyzed: na ca jātim vinā hoti ajātassa tad abhāvato ti jarā maraṇassa jāti paccayatam anvaya byatirekehi

original: Nirodhā nirodhasaṅkhātanti paccayanirodhā paccayuppannanirodhasaṅkhātaṃ. Anulomadesanāya ca vemajjhato paṭṭhāyāti yojanā.

original: Apuññābhisaṅkhārekadeso sarāgo rāgena sahajekaṭṭhoti katvā. Sabbopi apuññābhisaṅkhāro
analyzed: apuñña abhisaṅkhāra eka desaḥ sa rāgaḥ rāgena sahajā ekaṭṭhaḥ ti katvā sabbaḥ api apuñña abhisaṅkhāro

analyzed: sa rāgaḥ yasmā pana akusala dhammo akusala dhammassa sabhāgaḥ anakusala dhammo

original: visabhāgo, yathārahaṃ paccayo ca hoti, tasmā “apaṭipakkhabhāvato, rāgappavaḍḍhako”ti
analyzed: visabhāgaḥ yathāraham paccayaḥ ca hoti tasmai a paṭipakkha bhāvataḥ rāga ppavaḍḍhakaḥ ti

original: sabyāpāratā viññāṇassa vuttā. Sabyāpāratābhinivesabalavatāya, saṅkantiabhinivesabalavatāyāti
analyzed: sa byāpāra tā viññāṇassa vuttā sa byāpāra tā abhinivesa balavatāya saṅkanti abhinivesa balavatāya ati

original: paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ. “Asahavattanato, sahavattanato”ti etena asahavutti vinibbhogo,
analyzed: paccekam yojetabbam a sahavattanataḥ sahavattanataḥ ti etena a sahavutti vinibbhogaḥ

original: sahavutti avinibbhogoti dasseti.

analyzed: sabbo kāyo taca pariyantaḥ tu eva vuttaḥ ti dassento tad paṭibaddhā iti ādim āha atthi

original: Purimehīti purimapurimehi pañcakachakkehi sambandho vutto. “Maṃsaṃ…pe… vakka”nti

original: Kāyānupassanaṃ hitvāti asubhato vā dhātuto anupassanaṃ manasikāraṃ akatvā. Pubbe viya pariyantatālañca āditālañca agantvā.

original: Yamentanti bandhentaṃ.
analyzed: bandhentam

original: “Nīlaṃ pīta”ntiādinā saṅghāṭe nīlādivavatthānaṃ taṃnissayattā mahābhūte upādāyāti

original: yojanā. Tassāti upādārūpassa. Tatoti mahābhūtato. Chāyāya ātapapaccayabhāvo ātapo

original: Tena uppādetabbauppādakabhāvo aññamaññaparicchedakatāti dasseti. Āyatanāni ca dvārāni
analyzed: tena uppādetabba auppādaka bhāvaḥ aññamañña paricchedaka tā ti dasseti āyatanāni ca dvārāni

original: Sappaccayabhāvāti sappaccayattā.
analyzed: sappaccaya bhāvā ati sappaccaya ttā

original: Vaṇṇādimukhenāti vaṇṇapaṭikkūlasuññatāmukhena. Upaṭṭhānanti kammaṭṭhānassa upaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: vaṇṇa ādi mukhena āti vaṇṇa paṭikkūla suñña tā mukhena upaṭṭhānam ti kammaṭṭhānassa upaṭṭhānam

original: yo uggahoti vutto. Etthāti catukkapañcakajjhānapaṭhamajjhānavipassanāsu ekasmiṃ sandhīyati.

original: Kena? Kammaṭṭhānamanasikāreneva, tasmā uggahova sandhi uggahasandhīti veditabbaṃ.

original: Uṭṭhānakaṃ uppajjanakaṃ. Sātirekāni cha ambaṇāni kumbhaṃ. Tatoti mukhadhovanakhādanabhojanakiccato. Nivattatīti arahattādhigamena accantanivattivasena nivattati.
analyzed: uṭṭhānakam uppajjanakam sa atirekāni cha ambaṇāni kumbham tatas iti mukha dhovana khādana bhojana kiccataḥ nivattati iti arahatta adhigamena accanta nivatti vasena nivattati

original: Kammamevāti manasikārakammameva. Ārammaṇanti pubbabhāgabhāvanārammaṇaṃ.

analyzed: atha vā patati ettha ati pātīni cha ajjhattika bāhirāni āyatanāni vuttam hi chasu

original: Ayaṃ kāyakilamatho, thinamiddhañca etassa suttassa paccayo.

analyzed: migānam kotthukaḥ antar pakkhīnam pana vāyasaḥ iti vacanataḥ āha pakkhi jātīsu vāyasaḥ antar lāmakaḥ ti

original: 882. Virāganti arahattaṃ.

analyzed: anuddayassa iva iti mettāyantassa viya anukampantassa viya vikappanā ati āha saha nandita ādikassa ati

analyzed: duka niddesa vaṇṇanā
